According to research, 90% of adults do not know how to brush their teeth correctly, and 73% do not have the habit of brushing their teeth twice a day. For the kids, the caries rate has reached a staggering 70%. All of these may cause a series of dental diseases and problems, and that's why we created babahu toothbrush to maintain good dental health. What Can babahu® Bring to YouMuch efficiencyThe built-in AI-powered smart chip, Babahu X1 can adjust the vibrational frequency according to your teeth cleanliness, which kills 99.99% of oral bacteria in 20 seconds, and gives you hands free brushing experience.Safety & hygieneFDA medical approved brush bristles are made of liquid silicone gel which is molded into the unibody at a high temperature of 300 degrees Celsius. The unibody can reduce the germs embed into the gap among toothbrush bristles.Intelligent brushingThe Bass method is recommended by 80% of dentists worldwide and well-known. Designed on Bass technique, the 6D soft bristles cover your teeth at a specific 45° angle and provide 360° deep clean. Each bristle's vibration amplitude is at only 1 mm. It is easy for us and the kids to brush teeth intelligently without learning.More funBuilt-in audio alert for kids to identify different operation circumstances, like “Great”,”Keep it up”, “Please bite gently”, “See you next time”, etc. It can encourage our kids to brush.  When To UseBefore going to workThe pace of life is fast. Most of the time, you don’t have too much time for brushing. Do not worry, babahu X1 hands free smart toothbrush helps you to save time to deal with more work.Before going to BedMost of us are tired from work after every busy day. According to the research, 73% of us don’t have the habit of brushing before bed, and it seems reasonable but bad for teeth health. With babahu X1 AI powered toothbrush, you can brush teeth in each corner of your home and only 20 seconds, you can get intelligent brushing without extra fatigue.Pack it for travelbabahu® X1 adopts unique wireless induction type filling design, with Qi wireless fast 2-hour charging then 30-day standby. While you are in travel, we don’t need to worry about the toothbrush energy problems. The compact and portable design, it is very handy for travel. Special version for childrenThe cartoon design and intelligent voice reminder can attract your kid’s fun for brushing teeth. Children can brush their teeth efficiently with the intelligent Bass method, and prevent tender teeth from harmfully brushing. What's in the BoxToothbrush HeadMedical Grade Silica GelThe brush head is made out of an edible medical grade silica gel containing bacteriostat that is molded into the unibody of the brush at a high temperature of 300 Degrees Celsius. This design effectively stops the breeding of harmful bacteria that is usually found on traditional toothbrushes. This makes it easy to repeatedly clean and disinfect, even at high temperatures. U-shape Mouth Designbabahu® has its own patented U-shape mouth design featuring 6D bristles at a 45 degree angle with the teeth. The bristles can fit perfectly on the surface of teeth, cleaning them at 360 degrees. In just 20 seconds you can brush your teeth properly and efficiently that removes 99.99% of the bacteria in your mouth. When brushing, the conical design ensures the pressure on the gums is zero which makes it especially suitable for periodontal disease patients and children.ReplacementAs with regular manual toothbrushes and electric toothbrush heads, the mouthpiece should be replaced every 3-6 months. Many studies prove that used bristles are less effective in terms of plaque removal. A single mouthpiece will cost $15. Toothbrush BodyMaglev Sonic Motor PowerThe brush body adopts a magnetic levitation sonic motor with a vibration frequency of 18,000-40000 per minute (2-6 year old children: 18000-21800/minute, 6-12 year old children: 21800-31800, over 12 years old: 31800-40000), which is suitable for various oral conditions and applies the AI algorithms automatically that recognize when the brush head is connected. The algorithm in the brush body can identify the brush head intelligently according to different  age periods.Clean ModesThere is one key operation mode and two modes of Clean and Gum Care. Children’ version has an in-built voice algorithm: bite strength alerts, brush head usage and brushing stage details. Users can also customize voice memos later.IPX7 Waterproof and Anti-shockbabahu X1 toothbrush can be immersed in 1 m water for up to 30 minutes. It can survive accidental drops up to 1m, thanks to its anti-shock function. It’s made to handle everyday usage scenarios with ease. Charging BaseThe charging base adopts a unique Qi wireless induction design with a flexible placement of multiple brush heads. It can take up to 3 brush heads at a time and charges in just 2 hours which provides up to 30 days of standby. Media Records How To Use babahu® X1?  Why We Set 20 Seconds of BrushingThe babahu® X1 is more effective than a traditional toothbrush. With a regular toothbrush (ultrasonic or non-ultrasonic type), you’re told to brush the outer surface, inner surface and chewing surface with the bristles aligned at a 45 degree angle on each tooth for at least 6-10 seconds. An adult has 32 teeth that take an estimated brushing time of 3-5 minutes.The maximum strength child teeth can withstand is 100G and for an adult it’s between 120-150G. However, in the case of other smart toothbrushes, their average motor strength is around 175G which is above what is considered to be the safe limit. This is why the recommended brushing time is usually under 10 seconds. If you use them for a long period of time, you could damage your teeth.babahu® adapts its strength automatically and strictly observes the tolerance of teeth surfaces to make it more comfortable. Given that babahu® brushes your teeth gently with soft intensity, we suggest that 20 seconds of brushing with the babahu® is the ideal time for cleaning your teeth properly. Design Options Design AwardGolden Pin Design Award 2018babahu won the Golden Pin Design Award for presenting the most authoritative and well-known professional design. It is called "top design award in the global Chinese market" and "Golden Horse Awards in design industry" by media. babahu adheres to the innovation concept, designing much best potential and aesthetic toothbrushes. babahu® VS Philips  
babahu®Adults & ChildrenSpecifications  Authority Approved Ready To Ship
We know that most of us have ever joined many campaigns. It is painful to wait a long time. Don't worry, babahu has finished the first batch production, and we will ship the first patch of goods in January 2019!
Babahu® has collaborated with Flex Ltd for Product Manufacturing. FLEX is a world famous electronic professional manufacturing service company. babahu® and FLEX adheres to the concept of environmental protection and health, bringing the best environmental products to you!
 Our Team1. CEO AndyOnce the executive director and general manager of Marvis denture, he has more than 10 years of management experience in the dental industry and company operation with good credit and evaluation in the industry.2. Research and DevelopmentBabahu®’s research team has rich experience in project development and organization, with a solid background in software system integration, sensor control, intelligent system algorithm, and a variety of common programming techniques. The team is engaged in image algorithm, neural network, machine learning and Artificial Intelligence research for more than 20 years, responsible for the overall software system, hardware system and design and construction of robot AI algorithm. babahu® has a long practical experience in the field of artificial intelligence: language recognition, semantic understanding, speech applications such as synthesis, face or object recognition.3. Dr Sean CreaghanDr Sean Creaghan graduated from the University of Montreal In 1996 and got his bachelor of microbiology in l 'Universite McGill. He served as a dental director at the Royal Victoria hospital in 2002-2006.4. Dr JulienDr Julien graduated from the University of Montreal dental school. He has nearly 20 years of experience in dental specialty cultivation of surgical experts, and is good at business direction: oral plastic surgery, cosmetic plastic surgery and implant surgery specialist.5. Dr Pierre DupéréDr. Pierre Dupéré was graduated in dentistry from the University of Montreal in 1969. His experience and his global vision of the profession guarantee a safe diagnosis and uncompromising treatments. He has a great expertise in fixed and removable partial prostheses on implants, as well as in prosthetic rehabilitation with crowns and bridges. Warranty & Shipmentbabahu® X1 comes with a 12-month warranty for Indiegogo backers. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and is handled with the utmost care during shipment. We can ship to the first backers within 3 months. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. And will strive for excellence from project planning, production to order shipping. If there’s any obstacle, we will definitely keep you in the loop. Thanks for believing in us! Feel free to contact here: contact@babahutoothbrush.com. Help Us Spread Out The words, Thanks!

story:
Tender Loving Care and Inspiration for People with Cancer

We are Dirk-Karel and Angela. Together with our two young children, six cats and a dog, and with the invaluable help of family, friends and supporters, we are realising our dream to create a well-being retreat in the south of France for people with cancer.

 

 

 


Sadly, like most people, family and friends of ours have had cancer. Having seen first hand their struggle but also their courage and determination, we felt inspired by them to do something that could combine our resources and skills to help others with cancer. While supporting our loved ones, we found that they received good medical treatment, but advice about steps they could take for themselves, emotional support and nurture was often lacking, particularly once treatment ended. Seeing this need we decided to open a retreat for people with cancer where they can relax, recharge and re-focus.


We do not have a cure for cancer. We offer cancer fighters and survivors a beautiful haven from the tumult of treatment schedules and the strain of managing every day life, where they can enjoy a personalised programme of body-based therapies, take pleasure in nutritious, healing meals, and engage in activities that can bring lasting inner-peace, focus and inspiration. Our aim is to help improve the success of cancer treatments and aid recuperation, and encourage people to take steps in their lives to be healthier and, ultimately, happier.

 


We are very close to achieving our dream. This Autumn we entered into the final stage of renovating a ruined, medieval manor house - called Puyssentut. Surrounded by flower filled gardens and nestled amongst gently rolling hills, Puyssentut has become a very warm and welcoming house thanks to a team of experts and over a hundred volunteers who have offered their hands to its transformation. Here we have created restful, homely bedrooms; a comfortable lounge with a well-stocked, inspiring library; a cosy and sociable dining room; an inviting kitchen; relaxing therapy rooms; several sun terraces for that essential dose of vitamin D; a salt-water swimming pool; a juice bar; and extensive grounds to take a wander through, relax in or simply find a quiet spot to sit and enjoy the beauty of nature and the simple pleasures of life.

 

Even before Puyssentut has opened (we will open in April 2013), visitors and volunteers have found themselves affected by the convivial atmosphere, combined effort and shared vision.

 

Ciaran - a friend of ours with cancer - had this to say about her stay at Puyssentut in July this year:

"I can't tell you how deeply touched and healed I feel after just my tiny short visit there [Puyssentut] - partly because you guys are such warm, loving hosts and partly because of the hope it gives me for all the future possibilities I can involve myself in with you."

 

Meagan, who was prompted to volunteer at Puyssentut after her father died of cancer last year, experienced that:

"Puyssentut has been, for me, a place of restoration, in every sense of the word. This past Summer, I not only had the opportunity to help recreate some of the ancient beauty of this breathtaking manor house, I experienced renewal of my own health, confidence and perspective. I found myself amongst a community of people who know that life can be unpredictable and that everyone, at one time or another needs a safe space in which to rediscover who they were, who they are and who they might yet be. I am so excited to contribute to this incredible and important project."

 

How can you contribute?


We have put everything we have into bringing Puyssentut to life again: our lives, our love, our energy, our money, and even our family and friends. But now we need your help!


We need 190,000 dollars (equivalent to 150,000 Euros) to complete Puyssentut's transformation and convert the ancient, stone barn into a meditation and yoga studio and creative workshop. This space is important because it is where we will offer our guests activities through which they can discover untapped inner resources; connect with forgotten and unknown aspects of themselves; feel supported by and give support to others; and find peace, acceptance and inspiration. Converting the barn into an activity space will give people who stay at Puyssentut the chance to experience something new or find something precious within themselves, which they can take home and into their daily lives.


The money we are asking for is needed to pay for the work that we are not able to do ourselves. It will be used to pay for a new roof, the installation of electricity, plumbing and heating, insulation, and stone construction work.

 

 

 

How will your donation be spent?

In total we need 190,000 US Dollars (150,000 Euros) to convert the barn. This will be spent as follows:

  • 114,000 US Dollars (90,000 Euros) for a new roof;
  • 25,400 US Dollars (20,000 Euros) to install a heating system and insulate the building;
  • 25,400 US Dollars (20,000 Euros) to install electricity and plumbing;
  • 19,000 US Dollars (15,000 Euros) to put up new walls
  • 6,350 US Dollars (5,000 Euros) for materials, such as, wood for the floor, plaster, and paint.

 

What you will get?

We have put together many great gifts to thank you for helping us with our 'barn-raising', including: being invited to our opening party; receiving a voucher for someone with cancer (plus their carer) to stay at Puyssentut; and having the barn named after you.


Other ways you can help

Be a part of Puyssentut history by helping us spread the word about our 'barn-raising' appeal through Facebook (www.facebook.com/puyssentut) and Twitter (@puyssentut)and encouraging friends, family and acquaintances to donate.

Donate to the Puyssentut Foundation (a registered charity) and help people from all walks of life to stay at Puyssentut. The Puyssentut Foundation has been set up expressly to subsidise the cost of staying at Puyssentut for people on lower incomes: www.puyssentut.org/donating 

Tell people you know with cancer about us and how they can find us: www.puyssentut.org and www.facebook.com/puyssentut 

Volunteer with us and help complete Puyssentut's transformation. See the volunteering section on our website: www.puyssentut.org/volunteering

If you are a therapist or run workshops promoting health and well-being tell us about what you can offer: www.puyssentut.org/contact or email info@puyssentut.org

 

Who are we?

Hello, I am Dirk-Karel and for the last 18 years i have run my own business. After supporting three close friends with cancer I decided I wanted to do something which had a greater social impact, and I was inspired to set up a centre of well-being for people with cancer.

I have studied Zen meditation and macro-biotic cookery, both of which keep me centred and focussed. My own experience of the importance of these practices in my own life has spurred me on to offer these at Puyssentut.

 

Hello, I am Angela and I am a qualified counsellor and Core Energetic Therapist. I hold a Masters degree in Development Economics, and have worked extensively on social and economic policy issues in developing countries. I am also a certified Kundalini Yoga teacher.

After working for 10 years on international poverty issues I realised that I wanted to focus on issues in my own community while still feeling I was contributing to a better world. So I decided to retrain as a counsellor and Core Energetic therapist, and as a yoga teacher.

I became a therapist because I am fascinated by people and what it means to be human, and am intrigued by how different people react and respond to the challenges of life. I feel very moved and privileged to be able to support people at critical junctures in their life journeys.

I really enjoy providing a welcoming and caring environment for people. I love cooking and receive a great deal of pleasure from preparing delicious food for guests, family and friends, shared in convivial surroundings.

 

Thank you

Thank you to everybody for looking at this campaign and contributing to it.

Please follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/puyssentut on Twitter @puyssentut; and take a look at our website www.puyssentut.org and blog www.puyssentutdiaries.tumblr.com

story:
To learn more about Bishop & her story please visit:

Http://www.caringbridge.org/visit/bishopmikaelian

 This is the post from Facebook that made me want to do this campaign for Bishop:

 

Please pray for Bishop......"We have had an extremely busy and emotional week. Bishop had 6 appointments with her doctors at Vanderbilt. I'll try to make the update as brief as possible. 
MONDAY: Swallow Study - No good results. Bishop's speech therapist was able to attend to see that Bishop clearly cannot swallow. This was heartbreaking as we discussed the test and as of now, there is no improvement. The report, in detail, sums it up saying she has severe Dysphagia (see definition below). At this time, we have no promise that Bishop will be able to ever eat or drink again. 
TUESDAY: MRI @ night. 
WEDNESDAY: Oncology - Bishop had her check up. They did not have the results of the MRI on paper, but her doctor did call for a verbal result. Her tumor remains stable, so we will follow up in 3 months for her next MRI. We also received the approval for Bishop to go back on home-bound school part/full time when school starts. 
WEDNESDAY: General Surgery - Bishop's g-tube was irritating her, so we went to see a nurse about it. Due to her weight loss, they had to change out her g-tube for a smaller size. She will be taking a new formula next week to add extra calories so she does not lose any more weight (per Oncologist/Dietician). 
WEDNESDAY: Pulmonary - We met our new Pulmonologist, Dr. Chadha. He is really good. We discussed Bishop's reoccurring pneumonia and evaluated where she stands. He is ordering a CT scan of Bishop's lungs to see how badly scarred they are. As of now, he does not want any food, liquid, gum, or candy in Bishop's mouth. This means absolutely NO chewing/spitting out food! This was devastating to her. We discussed health vs. quality of life. In the end to compromise, he allowed her a once a day item to chew/spit out in order to taste some sort of flavor. 
THURSDAY: ENT - Bishop's ENT scoped Bishop's nose and throat. We can clearly see secretion hanging out around her vocal cords. This is showing that she is still not clearing out her saliva well causing aspiration. He ordered Bishop to not put anything, even once a day, in her mouth. 
Lastly, our secondary insurance has been cancelled. The harsh reality of this is that Bishop maxed out her OT, PT, and Speech therapy with her first insurance for the year. This was another blow to Bishop. She will not be able to receive the insured therapy services through her primary insurance until January 2013. 
So, not a good week when the best news you receive is that Bishop's tumor is stable. We've had a heart-to-heart conversation with Bishop that we are running out of options. Her speech therapist really had to push Bishop that she cannot afford to keep getting pneumonia and to exercise more. With all this news and Bishop's best friend, Allie, that moved away earlier this week, we are dealing with a lot of dark emotions with Bishop. 
We are trying to make the best of everything in order to give Bishop the best quality of life. I even told her that I would give her $1.00/day for every day she does not put anything in her mouth to avoid aspiration. She is one strong girl as I could not imagine what it would be like to never get the opportunity to taste anything again. Please pray for a healthy solution for Bishop."

story:
I don't know Ian and Larissa personally, but their story affected the deepest parts of my heart. They were married after Ian suffered a traumatic brain injury in a car accident. They are an amazing couple who exemplify God's love in a profound way...I'd love to see them blessed financially so they can get Ian the best therapies, have help with his care, take vacations together, and give Larissa more time to be at home. I'm moved by their faith and trust in God and His everlasting love, even in the face of difficulty most of us cannot imagine. 

 

More on their story here:

http://www.desiringgod.org/blog/posts/the-story... 

http://prayforian.com/

story:
Why we are
doing this
Why?
Cool features
Perks
Item specs
FAQ'S

The goal at LucidLights, LLC (makers of the LucidBrake) is to make the world a better place. Using our combined skills, we found a way that we felt we could do this. John knew electronics, EJ knew marketing, Capri knew design, Mike knew websites and Kyleah can dance her way around Facebook and the like. John had a great idea for a wireless brake light for cars, bicycles, boats or anything that moved. When we started to research its application in bicycles, we were astonished at the need for them. The accident rate was amazingly high - especially for riders who rode with others or in traffic. We felt our brake light could make a real difference, save lives and avoid countless injuries.



Cool features

back to top

  • 2 stopping modes (normal stop & emergency stop)

  • 4 different types of beacon modes:

    • Racing mode (no awareness beacon, 2-types braking mode)

    • Tail light mode (dim awareness beacon light on all the time & 2-types braking mode)

    • Cylon mode (bright flashing lights going vertically up and down the sides of brake light & 2-types braking mode)

    • Rotator mode (2 bright lights that travel around the brake & 2 types braking mode)

  • mounts anywhere (no wiring at all)

Why LucidBrake is better
than any other brake light.

  • no installation - no hardware or wires to hook up
  • attaches to anything including clothing
  • emergency braking indicator
  • works well over any terrain
  • functions appropriately at any speed, on any type of vehicle
  • water proof, not just resistant
  • Ultra bright

 

So what's the big deal?

2 types of braking indicated — Normal stop & Emergency stop. If you have to stop very suddenly, it flashes faster and brighter than if you are coming to a controlled type of stop. When John has to stop suddenly in traffic, he pumps his brakes to create a flashing effect so that the cars behind him get alerted early enough to avert running into him. He built this mode into the brake light and he uses one on his car just so that he doesn't have to do that anymore!

Unlike other brake lights, it doesn't have to be installed or alter the vehicle at all. In fact, it doesn't require it be mounted on a mechanical vehicle at all. This brake can be mounted on a person or a piece of equipment that is riding the ride. This is the first of its kind deceleration light (brake light) that doesn't have to be fixed to a certain position or to a piece of equipment. It literally just knows what to do no matter what position it is in in space.

The concept of a wireless brake light isn't new, it just has never been engineered to such precision functionality.

Who needs a LucidBrake?

Everybody! Specifically all bike riders for sure, especially if you ride your bike to/from/during work..

For example:

    • Professional Bicyclists

    • Patrolmen (Bike or Horse Patrol) (Police / Paramedic)

    • Mail Couriers

    • Newspaper Delivery

    • Missionaries

    • Commuters

But what if you don't ride a bike professionally, do you still need a LucidBrake? Why, yes you do!

Ask yourself, "Do I have a bike, a boat, a wheelchair, a scooter, a jet-ski, a skateboard, a go-kart, a power-wheel (for the kids of course), a stroller, a trailer, a pick-up truck with something hanging out the back? If the answer is yes to any of these then you need a LucidBrake!

LucidBrake is an anywhere brake light. It can attach to ANYTHING that moves, perhaps even your horse!

Device Specs:

back to top

Optional Top Plastic Cover

4 Beacon Modes

2 Braking Modes

Uses 2-AA batteries

Uses patent-pending algorithm for detecting deceleration

3" across

23 grams without batteries (estimated 40 grams with optional top plastic cover)

 

 

Perks


Who We Are

  • John Craig: CTO and Inventor Extraordinaire

 

  • Ellen Craig: CEO and Boss Lady

 

  • Kyleah Brock: Social Media Guru

 

  • Mike Flanagan: Web/Tech Dude

 

  • Capri Brock: Maker of Pretty Things and Media Contact

FAQ? back to top

How much does it weigh?

LucidBrake is about 23 grams. Two AAA batteries are also about 23 grams. That's very light weight, and that's why when attached to the back of a helmet people say they can't even tell it's there. Your cell phone weighs about 3 times that amount.

How big is a LucidBrake?

A standard business card is 3 1/2 inches edge to edge. A LucidBrake is 3 inches edge to edge, so a LucidBrake can't hide a business card.

How does LucidBrake attach to a bike or helmet?

One of the design goals was to be able to mount LucidBrake on a helmet, and conventional mounting solutions just wouldn't work for this.

Engineers at 3M convinced us to try their Dual Lock fasteners. We are glad we did, as these are working perfectly.

Dual Lock fasteners are used to attach metal siding up on buildings in extremes of weather conditions. You peel off a backing, stick identical pads to clean, dry surfaces such as the perfectly flat back of a LucidBrake and your bicycle seat post, back of your helmet, or just about anywhere you want a deceleration light, press together and go. If you park where theft might be a concern, Dual Lock fasteners let you pull them apart so you can take LucidBrake with you. You can pull apart and press together thousands of times.

Each square inch of Dual Lock fastener pads have 250 tiny mushroom headed posts. When pressed together these posts interlock with amazing tenacity. In all our bike testing we've never had a LucidBrake fall off.

Can I take it with me so it doesn't get stolen?

Yes you can. The Dual Lock fasteners make it easy to detach and reattach LucidBrake to your bicycle or other equipment as many times as desired.

Is there a power switch?

There's no power switch on a LucidBrake. John created some patentable circuitry that reduces battery current when parked in the garage to a tiny trickle. Calculations show the batteries should last multiple years sitting in the garage. Every few seconds the 3-axis accelerometer is checked to see if any change in orientation has occurred, and if so LucidBrake automatically springs back to life.

The batteries are easily accessed, so if you take LucidBrake with you the batteries can be removed to prevent bright flashing red lights where you probably don't want them.

Is it patentable?

When applying for our provisional patent we searched for similar patents, and we did find one, by an overseas company. However, LucidBrake does extend the state of the art, and here's why. The other people's patent describes the use of only one axis of acceleration to detect braking, and they go out of their way to explain the behavior on hills and slopes based on the use of just one axis. The very last sentence of their patent is this.. 'That is why this invention is called "wireless brake light" instead of "wireless deceleration light'.

LucidBrake, on the other hand, is truly a deceleration light, and not just a brake light. The biggest difference is that John figured out a way to use all three axes of the accelerometer to eliminate most of the effects of rotations and bumps, while detecting any changes in acceleration or deceleration beyond that of the force of gravity. There's more to our provisional patent, but this shortened explanation is at the heart of the differences.

So, LucidBrake can be mounted on the back of a helmet! (Theirs won't work there as described in their patent.) As the user rotates their head, most of the rotation effect is ignored, yet when the bicycle decelerates it detects and signals it. Also, if the mounting angle of LucidBrake isn't perfect, due to the angle of the seat post on a bicycle for example, it's okay, and LucidBrake instantly adjusts to the new angle. Theirs does not cover this in their patent at all.

story:
Our family will be participating in the 11th annual Head for the Cure 5K-KC Metro in honor of Shari, whom lost her 2 year battle with glioblastoma (brain cancer) this past September. Last year the race was record setting, with $350,000 raised toward brain cancer research!! Help us meet, or break, that goal with your contribution in Shari's name. Shari's fight against this terminal disease was an emotional rollercoaster of 6 weeks of radiation treatment, 3 rounds of chemotherapy, brain surgery, and countless MRIs in hopes of extending her life. She was a true warrior and is missed everyday by all those who loved her. Let's see how much we can raise in Shari's honor!! Every donation counts and is one step closer to a cure!!!

(Goal set at, but not limited to $500)

www.headforthecure.org

"Team Walkingtons" HFTC fundraising page:

https://www.vergeregistration.com/Events/HFTC/Head-for-the-Cure---Kansas-City-2013/Fundraising/List/Team/545

Proceeds support:

www.bttconline.org

www.solacehouse.org

story:
Our Story

I'm Robert DePietro 61 years old with a body that's falling apart. I've been told by the ear doctor that i have severe nerve damage in my ears. He was surprised that I could hear at all. (damage from 1,000's of concerts thru the years). My business has been non existant since the recession. I am currently just selling what I can on Ebay and sales are just enough to support me. Jobs with benefits are just not available to me. I am physically out of balance with a contant humming in my ear. I am living on a very tight budget and have no savings just my collection of posters. 

Hear well in a noisy world

Hearing aids, hearing protection & more

Last reviewed: July 2009

VIDEO:
Buying Hearing Aids
All videos

When we set out to test hearing aids, we encountered the same challenges that hearing-aid shoppers face every day: a fragmented and confusing marketplace and difficulty sorting out good hearing-aid providers from less-capable ones.

We followed a dozen actual patients for six months as they shopped for and used hearing aids, conducted a national survey of 1,100 people who had bought a hearing aid in the past three years, and lab-tested the features of 44 hearing aids. Here's what we found:

High prices

Our shoppers purchased two pairs of hearing aids each, or 48 aids in all, ranging from $1,800 to $6,800 per pair, including professional fitting and follow-up services, in the New York City metropolitan area.

Mediocre fitting

We had audiologists check how well providers fit our shoppers' hearing aids to their individual hearing loss. Two-thirds of the 48 aids they bought were misfit: They amplified too little or too much.

Lack of information

Most of the providers our shoppers visited discussed style and features, but a significant minority didn't. One-fourth of respondents to our survey, conducted by the Consumer Reports National Research Center, didn't know whether their aids had feedback suppression, and a third didn't know whether they had directional microphones. Both features can be critical to performance.

So why bother with hearing aids? Medical evidence shows that they can improve your quality of life and relationships with friends and family, so it's worth persevering until you get aids that are properly selected and fitted. Of our survey respondents, 73 percent pronounced themselves highly satisfied with their aids. As one of our shoppers noted, "I'm hearing music sounds I haven't heard for over 20 years."

Moreover, hearing-aid technology has made major strides in recent years, most notably with the development of very small open-fit digital hearing aids. In loud social settings, the most challenging environment for hearing-aid users, survey participants reported more improvement with those aids, which don't plug up the ear canal, over other styles that use earmolds, custom-shaped inserts that fit tightly in the ear canal.

If you're avoiding noisy places or having trouble in conversation or understanding TV, it might be time for a hearing aid. In our survey 67 percent of first-time aid users sought aids because they got tired of asking others to repeat themselves.

Once you've accepted your hearing loss and are considering getting hearing aids, your most consequential decision is finding the proper professional from whom to buy them because it's likely to be a long-term relationship. This is not a project for the faint-hearted because the industry is anything but standardized. Our shoppers encountered a variety of providers, including hospital-based clinics and strip-mall storefronts, all legally able to fit a hearing aid, but with varied resources and expertise. In this report, we'll help sort things out step by step.


The Impact

If I can get some help it will help ignite my business again and help me with some business ideas I am trying to put together.It will also hopefully allow me (once I can function again) to hire several people to help me sell.

If I can't get the funds I am very afraid i may lose my hearing which seems to get worse by the day.


What We Need & What You Get

If I can raise all the money I will be getting a $5,500.00 set of Hearing aids for $3,800.00. All money goes to Dr Barry Kaufman (I-45 feeder in Oak Ridge) any and all money will go to the hearing aids. I am ofering perks for donating. I have a hugh inventory of Posters movie, travel,Auto racing,food and drink. Most are vitage and rare posters valued from $20.00 to $600.00


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help would you please spread the word or email anyone you think might be able to help thank you all very much

story:
They're talking about us / Ils parlent de nous



A short introduction

I am Nicolas Pasquier, a 39 years old french entrepreneur with extensive experience in the IT and luxury industries. About a year ago I got an idea that was so crazy I had to follow it. So I founded Skinjay, a company located 20 minutes from Paris and at the north end of the Cosmetic Valley. As weeks turned into months, the idea turned into a concept then prototypes and finally into the patented products (patents pending) and technology you are about to discover thanks to the help and dedication of a very talented team.

Now we are looking for backers to join our team and help us build the future of Skinjay Paris. Back us up and you will become an active member of the Skinjay team and part of an entrepreneurial adventure.

Time is a luxury. Take time for yourself.

Because we live in a fast paced environment where it is harder everyday to find time for one self, Skinjay created an innovative product that brings pleasure to your shower!

No phone, No tablet, No kids. Just you, water and a little bit of magic in the shape of a small capsule and a patented innovative device that deliver wellness and organic skin care products directly into your water stream.

Natural skin care & wellness in a capsule

Skinjay is putting nature in a luxury capsule that delivers pure organic skin care and wellness products into your shower. For up to 8 minutes, the skinjay capsule mixes essential oils, organic skin care and natural fragrances with your water stream so that you can choose which skin or body care product is best for you today.

CAPSULES AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER 1.5€ to 2.5€ each (2$/3$)

How Skinjay delivers wellness into your shower

Skinjay presents the world's first shower capsule Mixer that turns your bathroom into your own private SPA. Connect once this luxury device to your shower head or shower hose, then simply choose a Skinjay capsule and insert it into the Mixer. For the next 4 to 8 minutes, enjoy the soothing power of the best quality organic skin care and fragrances being delivered directly into your water stream and onto your skin. Change capsule and discover a new experience everytime!

Take care of yourself and nature

We believe that you can do great things and still respect our ecosystem. That is why both Skinjay capsules and their content are made of natural products that are respectful of your skin and of nature:

  • The capsules’ body is made of hypoallergenic biodegradable material that respects European Union norm EN13432 for compostability.
  • The capsules content is made solely of organic ingredients selected for their excellent soothing and caring qualities.
  • The capsules biological content are produced by one of the leading organic skin care manufacturer in France.

Skinjay drives for the highest standards in skin care products quality so you can experience the safest and most relaxing way to shower. Just let warm water and soothing natural products enveloppe your entire body creating a new kind of shower experience... every time.

In-shower natural skin care

We are looking to preserve nature not to improve it. And we don't need to: skin pores do open up naturally under warm water. We simply take advantage of this fact to deliver high quality skin care, essential oils and moisturizers with the best possible effectiveness. Skinjay is not only easy to use, easier and faster to apply, it is actually the most effective solution for your skin. All you have to do is choose the capsule that's best for you today. And there are many many many different ones coming which you will be able to choose from.

Stay at home and treat yourself to a SPA

Skinjay's goal is not only to leave you with great skin but also with a feeling of peace and harmony. That is why we will create several capsule collections to  both care for and relax your skin, your body and your mind. With capsules focused on relaxation we will provide you with an easy way to cool down after a hard day at work, recover after your daily run or even get lucky with our upcoming naughty caps!

For our Indiegogo launch we are offering you SPA and essential oils capsules available in our Mixer & mix packs.

So what is the Skinjay Mixer ?

The Skinjay Mixer is a small sleek innovative device that easily connects in seconds to your shower hose or to your shower head. It allows you to easily insert a capsule and release organic skin care, fragrance or relaxing products directly into the water stream of your shower or your bath.

How does it work ?

The Mixer is a mechanical device made of high quality materials. It is designed to welcome any Skinjay capsule by simply sliding it into position as shown below. Once the capsule is inserted, a gentle 180° turn of the patented one-action wheel of the Mixer will release organic skin care  into your shower for the next 4 to 8 minutes giving you the pleasure to hydrate under the shower, relax with essential oils or even enjoy the soothing care of algotherapy.

Functional design with style

The simplicity of the Skinjay Mixer and the fact that it requires only two moves to be operational is no accident but the result of over a year of research and design. We still tried to create the most beautiful product possible and we are actually very proud of its design . The back plate will be manufactured in high-end chrome or inox but the front parts can be styled to create original designs which will  integrate perfectly within any bathroom. For our Indiegogo launch, you can choose between four different styles including the gorgeous Indiegogo limited edition.

Why we need you ?

We are currently at our 4th revision prototype of the Mixer and after demonstrating it and the capsules to hundreds of people over the last several months, we finally feel that the products are ready to enter into the next stage of production. We've determined that we can achieve the right price point if we commit to build a production scale of units. That's where we need your help.

Also, your feedback will be the (second) most important part of this Indiegogo challenge as it will direct our interest towards one of the many possible capsules collections including but not limited to:

  • Balneotherapy capsules: harnessing the known healing power of the sea salt and delivering it directly into your bathroom.
  • Algotherapy capsules: did you know that algae such as wrack, kelp and sea lettuce fresh contain phosphorus, potassium, magnesium, calcium, vitamins, plant hormone against aging, chlorophyll which is an antiseptic and detoxifying agent... ?
  • SPA capsules: for those of you equiped with state-of-the-art 43 nozzles rotating shower heads ;-) we will deliver tonic or relaxing ingredients in your SPA ‘à la maison’.
  • Kids capsules: because a pink bubble gum smelling shower or bath is so much FUN !

So get your own Skinjay mixer and capsule mix today and let us know what you want next!

The Perks - Help us and join our team

Purchase a mixer and become a member of our team with credits on the skinjay.com founders' page, access to the founders' corporate extranet where you will be able to vote for new collections, see the new products before they are announced, have a direct contact to our team, meet with us in Paris for the annual founders' meeting and party... YOU WILL NOT ONLY HELP US BUILD SOMETHING GREAT, YOU WILL BUILD IT WITH US!

Help us with any amount and become a member of the Skinjay Club with access to member's only discounts, deals and information AND get 10 free capsules on your first purchase on our upcoming online store.

Meet the team

The company was founded in 2012 by Nicolas Pasquier in order to create innovative eco-friendly products for the general public. Four partners soon joined in and have invested both their time and their money to create a product that will deliver a unique shower and bathing experience. The talented designer Loic Dubos joined and brought his design genius to the mix. The team members total way over 50 years of experience starting and developing companies, engineering and marketing products in Europe, Russia and North America.

What’s next ?

Here's a short roadmap outlining the production plans for the next few months after Indiegogo funding. As far as bio skin care products are concerned we have been working with manufacturers of french organic cosmetics and we will be finalizing our partnership within the next few weeks.

 

 

 

Une courte présentation

Je m'appelle Nicolas Pasquier, je suis un entrepreneur français de 39 ans avec une expérience dans les industries des nouvelles technologies et du luxe. Il y  a un peu plus d'un an, j'ai eu une idée si folle que j'ai décidé de la réaliser. J'ai donc créé Skinjay, une entreprise située à 20 minutes de Paris et à l'extrémité nord de la cosmetic valley. Alors que les semaines devenaient des mois, cette idée s'est transformée en prototypes pour enfin devenir la technologie et les produits que vous allez découvrir, notamment grâce à une équipe pleine de talent.

Maintenant nous sommes à la recherche de personnes souhaitant prendre part à cette aventure entrepreneuriale. Soutenez-vous et devenez un membre actif de l'équipe Skinjay!

Le temps est un luxe. Prenez du temps pour vous.

Nous vivons dans un monde en perpétuel mouvement dans lequel il est difficile de trouver du temps pour prendre soin de soi. Skinjay a donc conçu un produit unique qui diffuse du plaisir dans votre douche.

Pas de téléphone. Pas de tablette. Pas d'enfants. Juste vous, de l'eau et un petit peu de magie sous la forme d'une petite capsule et d'un dispositif breveté et innovant qui vont diffuser du bien être et des produits de soin pour la peau directement dans l'eau de votre douche.

Bien être et soins bio pour la peau dans une capsule

Skinjay met la nature dans une capsule luxueuse qui diffuse dans votre douche des soins naturels pour la peau et pour le bien être. Pendant un maximum de 8 minutes, la capsule mélange à votre flux d'eau des huiles essentielles pures, des soins bio pour la peau et des parfums naturels. Vous pouvez ainsi librement choisir quel soin est le plus approprié à votre peau aujourd'hui.

CAPSULES DISPONIBLES EN OCTOBRE DE 1.5€ A 2.5€ (2$ A 3$)

Skinjay diffuse du bien être dans votre douche

Skinjay présente le premier Mixer pour capsules de douche qui transforme vote salle de bain en SPA privé. Connectez le une bonne fois pour toute à votre pommeau ou à votre flexible de douche, choisissez une capsule et insérez là dans le dispositif. Pour les 4 à 8 minutes suivantes, découvrez les bienfaits de produits de soins bio pour la peau et des parfums diffusés directement dans le flux d'eau chaude de votre douche et sur votre peau. Changez de capsule et vivez une nouvelle expérience à chaque douche!

Prenez soin de vous et de la planète

Chez Skinjay, nous pensons qu'il est possible de faire de grandes choses tout en respectant notre environnement. C'est pour cette raison que les capsules Skjinjay et leur contenu sont fait de produits naturels respectueux de votre peau et de la nature:

  • Le corps des capsules est composé d'une matière hypoallergénique biodégradable qui répond aux exigences de la norme européenne EN13432 pour le compostage,
  • Le contenu des capsules est fait uniquement d'ingrédients naturels sélectionnés pour leur qualité de soin et leur pouvoir relaxant,
  • Le contenu bio des capsules est produit par un des leaders français dans le domaine des cosmétiques bio.

Skinjay s'inscrit dans une politique de haute qualité de soins pour que vous puissiez profiter de la douche la plus sûre et la plus relaxante possible. Laissez simplement l'eau chaude enveloppez votre corps pour créer une nouvelle expérience de douche... à chaque fois.

Des soins pour la peau pour la douche

Nous cherchons à préserver la nature non à l'améliorer. D'ailleurs nous n'en avons pas besoin: les pores de votre peau s'ouvre naturellement sous l'eau chaude. Nous profitons simplement de ce fait pour diffuser des soins de haute qualité pour la peau, des huiles essentielles et des soins hydratants avec la meilleure efficacité possible. Skinjay n'est pas seulement facile à utiliser, plus simple et plus rapide à appliquer: c'est LA solution la plus efficace pour prendre soin de votre peau ! Tout ce que vous avez à faire c'est  de choisir quelle est la meilleure capsule pour votre peau aujourd'hui.

Restez à la maison tout en profitant d'un SPA

L'objectif de Skinjay n'est pas seulement de soigner et d'embellir votre peau mais aussi de vous laisser en paix et en harmonie. C'est la raison pour laquelle nous allons créer plusieurs collections de capsules pour soigner et relaxer votre peau, votre corps et votre esprit. Avec des capsules axées sur la relaxation nous vous fournirons une façon simple et agréable de vous détendre après une dure journée au travail, de récupérer après votre jogging ou de vous détendre à deux avec nos futures capsules coquines!

Pour notre lancement sur Indiegogo nous vous proposons des capsules SPA et huiles essentielles au sein des packs Mixer et Mix.

Mais qu'est ce que le Mixer Skinjay?

Le Mixer Skinjay est un dispositif à la fois astucieux et luxueux qui se connecte en quelques secondes à votre pommeau ou à votre flexible de douche. Il vous permet alors d'insérer très facilement une capsule pour diffuser des soins et des produits bio relaxants directement dans l'eau de votre douche ou de votre bain.

Comment fonctionne le Mixer?

Le Mixer Skinjay est un dispositif mécanique fait de matériaux de qualité. Il a été conçu pour accueillir n'importe quelle capsule Skinjay en l'insérant simplement dans la fente prévue à cet effet comme présenté ci-dessous. Une fois la capsule en place, une simple rotation de 180 degrés sur la molette brevetée du Mixer va libérer des soins naturels dans l'eau de votre douche. Pendant 4 à 8 minutes, vous profiterez du plaisir de vous hydrater sous la douche, de vous détendre grâce aux huiles essentielles ou d'apprécier les bienfaits de l'algothérapie.

Un design fonctionnel avec du style

La simplicité d'utilisation du Mixer Skinjay et le fait qu'il ne nécessite que deux mouvements pour être opérationnel n'est pas un accident mais un long travail de recherche et de design. Nous avons cependant essayé de créer le plus beau produit qui soit et nous sommes très fier de son design. Si la partie arrière sera fabriquée en laiton ou en acier chromé, les parties mobiles à l'avant peuvent être designées pour créer des styles différents qui s'intègreront parfaitement dans tout type de salle de bain. Pour notre lancement sur Indiegogo, nous vous donnons le choix parmi 4 designs différents dont la superbe edition limitée Indiegogo en métal anodisé bleu.

Pourquoi nous avons besoin de vous?

Nous sommes actuellement dans la 4ème révision du prototype du Mixer et après l'avoir présenté à plusieurs centaines de personnes au cours des derniers mois, nous savons que le produit est maintenant prêt pour l'étape suivante: la production. Nous avons déterminé qu'il nous était possible d'atteindre l'objectif de prix public que noous nous sommes fixés si nous pouvons engager une production avec un certain nombre d'unités. C'est pour atteindre cette masse critique que nous avons besoin de votre aide.

De plus, votre retour d'usage sera la (deuxième) chose la plus importante de ce challenge en nous permettant de mieux comprendre les attentes de la clientèle et donc d'influencer la création de nouvelles collections de capsules:

  • Capsules de balnéothérapie: l'exploitation des pouvoirs de guérison reconnus du sel de mer et en le diffusant directement dans votre douche.
  • Capsules d'algothérapie: saviez-vous que certaines algues contiennent du phosphore, du potassium, du magnésium, du calcium et des vitamines efficaces contre le vieillissement ou encore de la chlorophylle qui est un agent antiseptique et détoxifiant ?
  • Capsules SPA: pour ceux d'entre vous qui sont équipés d'un pommeau de compétition avec 55 têtes rotatives ;-) les capsules SPA diffuseront des soins toniques ou relaxants dans votre 'SPA à la maison'.
  • Capsules enfants: parce que rien n'est plus marrant qu'une douche ou un bain avec de l'eau rose qui a le parfum du chewing gum.

Commandez votre Mixer Skinjay et vos capsules dès aujourd'hui et dites nous ce que vous voulez pour la suite!

Les Contreparties - Aidez-nous et rejoignez l'équipe!

Commandez un Mixer et devenez membre à part entière de note équipe avec votre nom sur la page des fondateurs sur notre site web skinjay.com, un accès à l'extranet des fondateurs de Skinjay sur lequel vous pourrez voter pour de nouvelles collections ou des améliorations, voir les nouveaux produits avant leur sortie, avoir un contact direct et privilégié avec notre équipe et vous joindre à nous pour l'évènement et la soirée annuelle Skinjay à Paris! VOUS NE NOUS AIDEREZ PAS SEULEMENT A CONSTRUIRE QUELQUE CHOSE DE GRAND, VOUS LE CONSTRUIREZ AVEC NOUS!

Soutenez-nous à partir de n'importe quel montant et devenez un membre du Club Skinjay avec un accès privilégié à des remises, coupons et des informations ET recevez 10 capsules gratuites lors de votre première commande sur notre future boutique en ligne.

Faites connaissance avec l'équipe

Skinjay a été fondée en 2012 par Nicolas Pasquier dans le but de créer des produits innovants et respectueux de l'environnement à destination du grand public. Trois associés ont depuis rejoint la société et ont investi leur temps et leur argent pour créer un produit qui propose une expérience unique de douche et de bain. Le designer de génie Loïc Dubos a apporté son talent au projet. L'équipe totalise plus de 50 années d'expérience à concevoir, créer et développer des nouveaux produits et des entreprises à la fois en Europe et en Amérique du Nord.

Tout de suite la suite

Voici une courte feuille de route décrivant nos plans pour les mois à venir pendant et après le financement Indiegogo. Concernant les produits de soins  nous travaillons avec des fabricants français de cosmétiques bio et nous sommes dans le processus de finalisation de ces partenariats.
story_txt:
They're talking about us / Ils parlent de nous
     A short introduction
I am Nicolas Pasquier, a 39 years old french entrepreneur with extensive experience in the IT and luxury industries. About a year ago I got an idea that was so crazy I had to follow it. So I founded Skinjay, a company located 20 minutes from Paris and at the north end of the Cosmetic Valley. As weeks turned into months, the idea turned into a concept then prototypes and finally into the patented products (patents pending) and technology you are about to discover thanks to the help and dedication of a very talented team.
Now we are looking for backers to join our team and help us build the future of Skinjay Paris. Back us up and you will become an active member of the Skinjay team and part of an entrepreneurial adventure.
Time is a luxury. Take time for yourself.
Because we live in a fast paced environment where it is harder everyday to find time for one self, Skinjay created an innovative product that brings pleasure to your shower!
No phone, No tablet, No kids. Just you, water and a little bit of magic in the shape of a small capsule and a patented innovative device that deliver wellness and organic skin care products directly into your water stream.

Natural skin care & wellness in a capsule
Skinjay is putting nature in a luxury capsule that delivers pure organic skin care and wellness products into your shower. For up to 8 minutes, the skinjay capsule mixes essential oils, organic skin care and natural fragrances with your water stream so that you can choose which skin or body care product is best for you today.
CAPSULES AVAILABLE IN OCTOBER 1.5€ to 2.5€ each (2$/3$)

How Skinjay delivers wellness into your shower
Skinjay presents the world's first shower capsule Mixer that turns your bathroom into your own private SPA. Connect once this luxury device to your shower head or shower hose, then simply choose a Skinjay capsule and insert it into the Mixer. For the next 4 to 8 minutes, enjoy the soothing power of the best quality organic skin care and fragrances being delivered directly into your water stream and onto your skin. Change capsule and discover a new experience everytime!

Take care of yourself and nature
We believe that you can do great things and still respect our ecosystem. That is why both Skinjay capsules and their content are made of natural products that are respectful of your skin and of nature:

The capsules’ body is made of hypoallergenic biodegradable material that respects European Union norm EN13432 for compostability.
The capsules content is made solely of organic ingredients selected for their excellent soothing and caring qualities.
The capsules biological content are produced by one of the leading organic skin care manufacturer in France.
Skinjay drives for the highest standards in skin care products quality so you can experience the safest and most relaxing way to shower. Just let warm water and soothing natural products enveloppe your entire body creating a new kind of shower experience... every time.

In-shower natural skin care
We are looking to preserve nature not to improve it. And we don't need to: skin pores do open up naturally under warm water. We simply take advantage of this fact to deliver high quality skin care, essential oils and moisturizers with the best possible effectiveness. Skinjay is not only easy to use, easier and faster to apply, it is actually the most effective solution for your skin. All you have to do is choose the capsule that's best for you today. And there are many many many different ones coming which you will be able to choose from.

Stay at home and treat yourself to a SPA
Skinjay's goal is not only to leave you with great skin but also with a feeling of peace and harmony. That is why we will create several capsule collections to  both care for and relax your skin, your body and your mind. With capsules focused on relaxation we will provide you with an easy way to cool down after a hard day at work, recover after your daily run or even get lucky with our upcoming naughty caps!
For our Indiegogo launch we are offering you SPA and essential oils capsules available in our Mixer & mix packs.

So what is the Skinjay Mixer ?
The Skinjay Mixer is a small sleek innovative device that easily connects in seconds to your shower hose or to your shower head. It allows you to easily insert a capsule and release organic skin care, fragrance or relaxing products directly into the water stream of your shower or your bath.
How does it work ?
The Mixer is a mechanical device made of high quality materials. It is designed to welcome any Skinjay capsule by simply sliding it into position as shown below. Once the capsule is inserted, a gentle 180° turn of the patented one-action wheel of the Mixer will release organic skin care  into your shower for the next 4 to 8 minutes giving you the pleasure to hydrate under the shower, relax with essential oils or even enjoy the soothing care of algotherapy.

Functional design with style
The simplicity of the Skinjay Mixer and the fact that it requires only two moves to be operational is no accident but the result of over a year of research and design. We still tried to create the most beautiful product possible and we are actually very proud of its design . The back plate will be manufactured in high-end chrome or inox but the front parts can be styled to create original designs which will  integrate perfectly within any bathroom. For our Indiegogo launch, you can choose between four different styles including the gorgeous Indiegogo limited edition.

Why we need you ?
We are currently at our 4th revision prototype of the Mixer and after demonstrating it and the capsules to hundreds of people over the last several months, we finally feel that the products are ready to enter into the next stage of production. We've determined that we can achieve the right price point if we commit to build a production scale of units. That's where we need your help.
Also, your feedback will be the (second) most important part of this Indiegogo challenge as it will direct our interest towards one of the many possible capsules collections including but not limited to:


Balneotherapy capsules: harnessing the known healing power of the sea salt and delivering it directly into your bathroom.

Algotherapy capsules: did you know that algae such as wrack, kelp and sea lettuce fresh contain phosphorus, potassium, magnesium, calcium, vitamins, plant hormone against aging, chlorophyll which is an antiseptic and detoxifying agent... ?

SPA capsules: for those of you equiped with state-of-the-art 43 nozzles rotating shower heads ;-) we will deliver tonic or relaxing ingredients in your SPA ‘à la maison’.

Kids capsules: because a pink bubble gum smelling shower or bath is so much FUN !
So get your own Skinjay mixer and capsule mix today and let us know what you want next!

The Perks - Help us and join our team
Purchase a mixer and become a member of our team with credits on the skinjay.com founders' page, access to the founders' corporate extranet where you will be able to vote for new collections, see the new products before they are announced, have a direct contact to our team, meet with us in Paris for the annual founders' meeting and party... YOU WILL NOT ONLY HELP US BUILD SOMETHING GREAT, YOU WILL BUILD IT WITH US!
Help us with any amount and become a member of the Skinjay Club with access to member's only discounts, deals and information AND get 10 free capsules on your first purchase on our upcoming online store.
 
Meet the team
The company was founded in 2012 by Nicolas Pasquier in order to create innovative eco-friendly products for the general public. Four partners soon joined in and have invested both their time and their money to create a product that will deliver a unique shower and bathing experience. The talented designer Loic Dubos joined and brought his design genius to the mix. The team members total way over 50 years of experience starting and developing companies, engineering and marketing products in Europe, Russia and North America.

What’s next ?
Here's a short roadmap outlining the production plans for the next few months after Indiegogo funding. As far as bio skin care products are concerned we have been working with manufacturers of french organic cosmetics and we will be finalizing our partnership within the next few weeks.

L'équipe totalise plus de 50 années d'expérience à concevoir, créer et développer des nouveaux produits et des entreprises à la fois en Europe et en Amérique du Nord.

Tout de suite la suite
Voici une courte feuille de route décrivant nos plans pour les mois à venir pendant et après le financement Indiegogo. Concernant les produits de soins  nous travaillons avec des fabricants français de cosmétiques bio et nous sommes dans le processus de finalisation de ces partenariats.

story:
The What: Online, Completely Donation-Based, Yoga and Meditation Studio.  We want to help make yoga and meditation accessible to EVERY BODY.  Download or stream ANY class/session/tip you want … if you find value in our little business, then donate what you think is fair and respectable.  

Our Future Site (still under construction and in testing phase): enterzenhere.com

The Who: Who is EZ Yoga = Rodger and Anita, husband and wife, she teaches yoga and does the graphic design...he does the technical, videography and web stuff.  For the past year and a half we have worked hard on this passion project in our spare time and spent over ten thousand dollars of our own money to get it out to you – we know there is a huge risk our little business idea won't make a dime.  But, what if, why not, donation-based businesses and products?! A new way of doing business that levels the financial playing field to  allow everyone access to a product.

The Why: Our yoga philosophy – Easy, Real, and Accessible Yoga and Meditation for every body type.  We hope to share with you the joy, stillness, and magical physical and mental connection that a regular yoga and meditation practice invokes. Teaching is just a form of reminding, reminding one who no longer believes or has forgotten that their body IS capable of experiencing joy and their mind IS capable of experiencing quiet peace, no matter their range of motion or physical capacity.

Each time we spark up a conversation with a stranger about yoga we feel a palpable sense of energy, a sense of right-timing, a genuine interest that humankind is ready to let the beauty, peace, and stillness of yoga into their own lives and the global community. 

 Please join us, on your own terms, in your own in-home studio.

"As you lay down your ego, I recognize the beauty within you. As you live within the present moment, I am reminded of the joy of life, thank you for joining me, namaste!"    ~ anita

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are low on funds, you can still help by giving us a "Shout Out" to all your friends and family - Help us get the word out about our project.

We are always looking for great yoga musicians and yoga and meditation instructors who want to join our project ... if you are passionate about what you do, we want to work with you.

story:
I’m Gary Calderone, a Colorado-based Pilates practitioner/teacher since 1993 and author of the book The Pilates Path to Health: Body, Mind, and Spirit , first published in 2011.

I created my book in order to address a widespread misunderstanding about the nature and value of Pilates.  Among the general public, Pilates is mainly seen as a method of exercise aimed at fitness. But those who really know Pilates realize that it is much more than exercise -- it is a path to comprehensive health in body, mind and spirit. In short, Pilates is meant to be transformative. It is my understanding and  others (endorser's) that this was clearly Joseph Pilates’ intent; and it is the focus of my work and the message of my book. I want to share this understanding of Pilates as broadly as possible.

I’m raising money to finance a new printing of the book, so that it can reach more readers who might benefit from its message. Again, I feel this reflects Joe’s intent. He desired, and even predicted, that the deep, transformative character of Pilates would one day be understood by men and women, young and old, rich and poor, teacher, student and client alike, worldwide. Joe meant to change the world; and so do I.

The Timing is Perfect

Filmmaker Mark Pedri will release his new film about Pilates, “A Movement of Movement,” in 2014. This film, in my view, is a perfect companion to my book -- the film and book share a similar understanding of Pilates. Mark Pedri did me the honor of including me in his film. He also offered the following comment after reading my book:

“I am so glad that you gave it to me to read. Your connection between Pilates and reaching one's potential is so important. The way you kept tying it back to "Return to Life" was brilliant. Your book is a great read not just for the someone in the Pilates community, but also for anyone who is interested in reaching their full potential!"

I anticipate that Mark’s film will be shown widely during 2014 and beyond, both at dedicated Pilates events (trainings, symposia) and in more general venues. From this, I believe many viewers could be inspired to seek out my book. Therefore, it’s important to have lots of copies available for distribution by the time the film comes out. I’m seeking your help to finance a larger printing of the book so that it can reach its intended audience now, while the timing is right.

What I Need, and What It’s For

I need to raise $5,500 to finance a new print run of my book by December 11th, 2013.

The book has been widely praised and received About.com’s Readers’ Choice Award in 2012 for the best new book about Pilates. Renowned Pilates teacher Wendy Leblanc-Arbuckle, who wrote the book’s Foreword, captures the book’s unique value when she says:

"With the explosive growth of Pilates, we are in danger of losing the soul of Joseph Pilates vision. Gary Calderone's work carries a message whose time has come. He dives us deep into the heart of Joe's work, placing it at dead center in the resurgence of mind/body perspective...and shines a bright and clear light on the transformational pathway that it provides for realizing our fullest potential, physically, emotionally and spiritually."

Now, I want to print a much larger number of books in anticipation of increasing demand in the year ahead. The “explosive growth” of Pilates continues worldwide, and with it comes the constant need to emphasize Pilates’ true purpose, as Joe himself understood it then (1883-1967) and now translated for the 21st century. That is my mission, and the essence of my book. In order to advance this mission, I’m obliged to come up with the cash to finance that next big printing -- hence this fundraising campaign.

I’m asking everyone who cares about Pilates and the potential for human transformation in body, mind and spirit to join me in making sure my book is available to the ever-growing audience of people who are just discovering Pilates for themselves. I want my book to be featured in Pilates studios and training centers everywhere. I want it in libraries and bookstores. With your help, all this can happen.

When you really believe in something, you give to it. I want to be a part of something larger than the space I occupy. I've invested over ten years of my life in this effort and am determined to see this message realized. Please, join me.

What's In It for You?

Whether you can contribute a little or a lot, I want to convey my heartfelt thanks by offering you valuable “perks” for every level of giving. Along with the satisfaction of knowing that you’ve really helped a good cause, here’s what else you’ll get when you give:

$25 ~ A Digital Audio Download of my informative CD

    My CD, The Pilates-Contrology Correlation: Going Beyond Technique, actually preceded the book. It’s an inspirational and convenient way to “listen and learn”  providing state of the art information on the life-changing effects that Pilates can have on you and everyone you touch in your Pilates practice. Here’s a brief sample of listener comments:

    “These concepts that you have organized so well serve to emphasize the value that we bring to each individual that crosses our path. I listen to at least some of your CD once a week. Your voice and clarity are a wonderful part of my week!” –– Kate Wodash, Pilates teacher

    “The production quality is excellent, the relevancy to the experience of Pilates is excellent, and listening while driving is convenient.”
    –– Peter Fiasca, Ph.D., Classical Pilates Continuing Education

$50 ~ CD and Companion Booklet of The Pilates-Contrology Correlation: Going Beyond Technique

    The tracks on my CD, The Pilates-Contrology Correlation: Going Beyond Technique, and accompanying booklet, first released in 2006, explains in conversational style much of the baseline research and concepts that are further detailed in my 2011 book. Included with the CD is a companion booklet that provides visual aids; charts and drawings, to depict the concepts. Listening and seeing the concepts inherent in Contrology may explain the profoundness of the statement "Pilates has changed my life!". Teachers say the content resonates with and explains their perceptions of Pilates philosophy and stimulates class planning ideas.

    “I was intrigued by the content of your CD because for the first time in my experience someone had painstakingly examined the philosophies of Pilates on a significant intellectual level rather than just the movements by themselves. Thank you for making us think about our purpose in what we do.”
    –– Gerald N. Morigerato, P.T., Northstar Pilates Solutions, LLC

    “Powerful for bringing any teacher to the next level. Don't intellectualize. Listen to this CD with your heart, soul, and open mind and feel the shift happen to the deepest part of yourself where the truth resides within us all.”
    –– Heidi Miller, host of “Beyond The Movement: The Pilates Podcast”

$125 ~ A autographed copy of my book The Pilates Path to Health: Body, Mind, and Spirit, plus digital audio download of my CD with eBooklet

    “Thank you Gary for reminding us all as to why we believe in the healing power of Pilates. The work has proven itself time after time. I purchased your book and read it in just a few short days. I have underlined and made notes throughout the book which has affirmed what I believe to be true or gave me a new perspective.  I especially like how you have connected the Pilates principles to the metaphysical correlation of something deeper. I love it!“
    — JIll Dupslaff 

$500 ~ A signed copy of my book The Pilates Path to Health with a personalized message from the author acknowledging your generous contribution; plus the Limited Edition~ CD of The Pilates-Contrology Correlation: Going Beyond Technique and Companion Booklet

Ideal perk for those that would like to enhance the value of their personal library with historical, educational and collectable significance 

    "You have the vision and enthusiasm that Joseph himself had. I will continue to share ‘insights’ from your book and CD with my clients. Thank you.” 
    — Beth Gannon, PMA-CPT

$2,500 ~ Pilates Seminar with Gary Calderone! A half-day seminar anywhere in the continental US and Canada plus a signed copy of The Pilates Path to Health with a personalized message from the author acknowledging your vital contribution to this effort.

    This multi-media, interactive seminar defines Pilates as self healing and transformational. Suggests that Joseph Pilates clearly foresaw how the widespread embrace of his work could change human thinking and living. Delivers the understanding needed for the message that fortifies your teaching. Offers innovation and science that influence our well being and lend credence to what Pilates teachers provide, that the practice of Contrology could do no less than eliminate human suffering.
    "We recently had Gary at our Pilates retreat to present his seminar and he was amazing not only in his philosophy but his teaching principles. Everyone should read his book and hopefully get to experience Gary's teachings that integrates the Mind Body connection. It is an honor to have Gary in our community and as one of my mentors."
    —Kathleen Haden, PMA-CPT, Master Pilates Teacher Trainer for Balanced Body University
    "The information provided in the PowerPoint presentation at The Body, Mind, Spirit Retreat was clearly different with regard to any Pilates seminar I've attended...and will be very valuable for myself as well as my clients."
    — Joan Mc Connel, PMA-CPT

Here’s a brief sample of comments from previous workshop participants:

    “Pure inspiration, delivering the intangible aspect of the work we do.”
    “Putting in perspective what the spirit part really means.”
    “Getting ‘big picture’ of our Pilates work in a snapshot, small group, work/sharing experience was very enriching. Good notes to take away as well.”
