story:
The Pilates Wheel 2.0,  is now available exclusively on Indiegogo In-Demand and can provide you with a full machine Pilates workout anywhere, anytime. From the comfort of your living room to the motivating environment of a gym, you can do machine Pilates progressions on your own terms and at your own pace.

 

 

Despite being a super-compact device Pilates Wheel 2.0 sports endless amazing features including:

Break Pilates Wheel 2.0 down in a snap and store it anywhere.

 Perform hundreds of familiar and modified machine Pilates moves.

Pilates Wheel 2.0 keeps you safe while you have fun by not putting unnecessary stress on your joints.

Pilates Wheel 2.0 is built to last with a light and yet durable rubber and metal frame.

Pilates Wheel 2.0 is the only in-home workout system that delivers ALL of these amazing benefits simultaneously:

 

How does Pilates Wheel create such diversity of movement? It's all about the technology! Pilates Wheel's adjustable footbar and hub-rotating wheel give it the ability perform every move expensive studio reformers can. Here's a closer look at each feature:

 

The Pilates Wheel 2.0 showcases a state of the art design that harnesses rotation, leverage and resistance bands to emulate every movement and progression big expensive reformers feature. 

 

 

Yes, you can! Pilates Wheel Instructor Kristin Anderson has been teaching Pilates at an elite level for 25 years and has helped countless Hollywood celebrities get red carpet ready with Pilates programs! Kristin is ready to guide you through her world-class programs, step-by-step so you can be training like the elite in no time!

 

Aside from expert instruction, Pilates Wheel 2.0 delivers the true machine Pilates experience because of its design's ability to facilitate 100s of easy to complex progressions. Brian Abercrombie, Pilates Wheel's Co-Founder has an extensive background in human-performance and training elite athletes. Together, Kristin and Brian have a created a device suited for any level of Pilates experience and athletic ambition!

 

 

 

We've already had tonnes of people test out the new Pilates Wheel 2.0 with our comprehensive workout and nutrition programs so we could get their feedback and see their results. The response has been truly amazing and people are loving what we call the "Pilates Wheel Lifestyle". Check out the videos below to learn a bit more about what the Pilates Wheel Lifestyle means to some of our earliest 2.0 users. You'll be amazed at their unbiased feedback and results!

 

 

 

 

 

Pilates Wheel needs your help to release its latest and greatest iteration in its quest to bring accessible machine Pilates to the masses. As a thank you, right here on Kickstarter, we’re offering you first dibs on the brand new version of Pilates Wheel as well as packages and deals you won’t find anywhere else! 

Here are some of the amazing Rewards we are offering to you for your help: 

Don't wait! Join us by selecting a Perk on the top right side of the page!

 

Patience is a virtue, but for those who can't wait for their Pilates Wheel 2.0, we've made this chart that breaks down where we've come from and, more importantly, when we plan to deliver your pledge reward! 

 

 

We will try our best to stick to the this timeline and are confident in our ability to do so. However, we will make frequent and clear communication an absolute priority so you'll know if there are any delays and how we plan to remedy them. We are so excited to have you on board! We can wait to hear about your own personal Pilates Wheel transformation!
story_txt:
Pilates is one of the few workout regiments that really has it all, simultaneously pushing your limits in the areas of strength, balance and flexibility. Machine Pilates is the most comprehensive and versatile form of Pilates, but there are a few glaring flaws with it: it’s cumbersome, expensive, and is completely impractical to do in the home. That is until now… 
 
INTRODUCING The Pilates Wheel 2.0,  is now available exclusively on Indiegogo In-Demand and can provide you with a full machine Pilates workout anywhere, anytime. From the comfort of your living room to the motivating environment of a gym, you can do machine Pilates progressions on your own terms and at your own pace.  

  Despite being a super-compact device Pilates Wheel 2.0 sports endless amazing features including:Break Pilates Wheel 2.0 down in a snap and store it anywhere.
Pilates Wheel 2.0 fits into your gym bag so you can take it anywhere. Perform hundreds of familiar and modified machine Pilates moves.Pilates Wheel 2.0 keeps you safe while you have fun by not putting unnecessary stress on your joints.Pilates Wheel 2.0 is built to last with a light and yet durable rubber and metal frame.Wondering what's new in the Pilates Wheel 2.0 edition? Well let's just say you are in for a treat! Check out the new features below.
 

 

 
Imagine, being able to fit all this technology and all these moves into the same space as your washer and dryer. Pilates Wheel 2.0 makes it a reality! 
 

 Pilates Wheel 2.0 is the only in-home workout system that delivers ALL of these amazing benefits simultaneously:
 
Pilates Wheel is able to deliver all the benefits above while really standing out from the alternatives from a cost and practicality perspective as well! Take a look at this chart comparing Pilates Wheel with some other options on the market:
 
 How does Pilates Wheel create such diversity of movement? It's all about the technology! Pilates Wheel's adjustable footbar and hub-rotating wheel give it the ability perform every move expensive studio reformers can. Here's a closer look at each feature: The Pilates Wheel 2.0 showcases a state of the art design that harnesses rotation, leverage and resistance bands to emulate every movement and progression big expensive reformers feature.    Yes, you can! Pilates Wheel Instructor Kristin Anderson has been teaching Pilates at an elite level for 25 years and has helped countless Hollywood celebrities get red carpet ready with Pilates programs! Kristin is ready to guide you through her world-class programs, step-by-step so you can be training like the elite in no time! Aside from expert instruction, Pilates Wheel 2.0 delivers the true machine Pilates experience because of its design's ability to facilitate 100s of easy to complex progressions. Brian Abercrombie, Pilates Wheel's Co-Founder has an extensive background in human-performance and training elite athletes. Together, Kristin and Brian have a created a device suited for any level of Pilates experience and athletic ambition!   We've already had tonnes of people test out the new Pilates Wheel 2.0 with our comprehensive workout and nutrition programs so we could get their feedback and see their results. The response has been truly amazing and people are loving what we call the "Pilates Wheel Lifestyle". Check out the videos below to learn a bit more about what the Pilates Wheel Lifestyle means to some of our earliest 2.0 users. You'll be amazed at their unbiased feedback and results! We've come a long way! Pilates Wheel has been thoroughly tested and adapted throughout several iterations!    Pilates Wheel needs your help to release its latest and greatest iteration in its quest to bring accessible machine Pilates to the masses. As a thank you, right here on Kickstarter, we’re offering you first dibs on the brand new version of Pilates Wheel as well as packages and deals you won’t find anywhere else! Here are some of the amazing Rewards we are offering to you for your help: Don't wait! Join us by selecting a Perk on the top right side of the page! Patience is a virtue, but for those who can't wait for their Pilates Wheel 2.0, we've made this chart that breaks down where we've come from and, more importantly, when we plan to deliver your pledge reward!   We will try our best to stick to the this timeline and are confident in our ability to do so. However, we will make frequent and clear communication an absolute priority so you'll know if there are any delays and how we plan to remedy them. We are so excited to have you on board! We can wait to hear about your own personal Pilates Wheel transformation!

story:
• Finalized version of AmaMax Rush is exclusively available through Indiegogo at a limited time discount in the U.S., Australia, and Canada.
  • Formulated with an optimal 3.5:1 ratio of high quality carbohydrates and proteins derived from the Amaranth super grain, pure whey protein isolates and other natural ingredients.
  • Tastes great – just like a chocolate mousse dessert. We tested over 3,000 sample packs of AmaMax Rush with people from around the globe to get the taste just right.
  • Free of gluten, soy, nuts, and trans fats.
  • We're sponsoring three up-and-coming athletes with full-year supplies of AmaMax Rush. 

AmaMax Rush is a delicious recovery food that combines the latest in nutritional research with the super grain Amaranth and other natural ingredients to reduce recovery time following exercise.

The truth is many of us don’t get a combination of both proteins and carbohydrates before, during, and after exercises, when this is exactly what we need to perform at our best.

AmaMax Rush delivers just that. It’s the culmination of five years of the latest in nutritional research and testing to provide the most functional sports recovery food on the planet. And at the heart of it all are its ingredients. Made using natural gluten-free ingredients and the super grain Amaranth, AmaMax Rush fuels you with the nutrients you need to perform at your peak, recover faster and live healthier.

The Science. 

We developed Rush with a scientifically-proven 3.5:1 ratio of high-quality carbohydrates and proteins derived from the Amaranth grain and other natural ingredients, to deliver an array of recovery and health benefits.

The following chart shows the main differences between proteins (PRO) alone or carbohydrates (CHO) alone versus a combination of proteins and carbohydrates found in AmaMax Rush:

Ivy, J., Portman, R. (2004), ‘Nutrient Timing: The Future of Sports Nutrition’, Basic Health Publications Inc., table 5.1, pp. 64. 

Unlike other leading energy bars, gels and sports drinks, AmaMax Rush is proven to offer significant advantages in reducing muscle damage, speeding muscle recovery, enhancing endurance, and boosting healthy immune function. All of these exercise performance benefits from consuming carbohydrates and proteins together are backed by numerous research studies.

Effects of Recovery Beverages on Glycogen Restoration and Endurance Exercise Performance

In this study eight endurance-trained cyclists were each given high carbohydrate-protein (CHO-PRO) beverages and traditional all-carbohydrate (AC) beverages immediately and two hours after two two-hour trial rides. Ingestion of the CHO-PRO beverage resulted in a 17% greater plasma glucose response, a 92% greater insulin response, and a 128% greater storage of muscle glycogen compared to the AC beverage. These findings demonstrate that the rate of recovery is coupled with the rate of muscle glycogen replenishment and suggest that CHO-PRO recovery supplements should be consumed to optimize muscle recovery.

Williams, M. et al. (2003), ‘Effects of Recovery Beverages on Glycogen Restoration and Endurance Exercise Performance’, Journal of Strength and Conditioning Research, vol. 17, no. 1, pp. 12-19.

The Effect of Carbohydrate and Protein Supplement on Resistance Exercise Performance, Hormonal Response, and Muscle Damage

The study used 34 male subjects to determine whether resistance exercise performance and post-exercise muscle damage were altered when consuming a carbohydrate and protein beverage. Each subject performed three sets of eight repetitions at their eight repetition maximum to fatigue for multiple exercises. The results demonstrated that the CHO-PRO supplement reduced muscle damage and soreness, as evidenced by the elevated response levels of both myoglobin and creatine kinase.

Baty, J. et al. (2007), ‘The Effect of Carbohydrate and Protein Supplement on Resistance Exercise Performance, Hormonal Response, and Muscle Damage’, Journal of Strength and Conditioning Research, vol. 21, no. 2, pp. 321-329.

Effect of a Carbohydrate-Protein Supplement on Endurance Performance During Exercise of Varying Intensity

In this study nine trained cyclists were given carbohydrate-protein 

(CHO-PRO) 

beverages and all-carbohydrate (AC) beverages to compare the effects. Athletes were given supplements every 20 minutes during three separate testing trials. Carbohydrate supplementation was found to significantly increase the time to exhaustion, while the addition of protein enhanced the effect of the carbohydrate supplement. Therefore, the addition of protein leads to an improved insulin response of a carbohydrate supplement, resulting in improved aerobic endurance performance.

Ivy, J. et al. (2003), ‘Effect of a Carbohydrate-Protein Supplement on Endurance Performance During Exercise of Varying Intensity’, International Journal of Sport Nutrition and Exercise Metabolism, vol. 13, pp. 382-395.

Coingestion of Protein with Carbohydrate During Recovery From Endurance Exercise Stimulates Skeletal Muscle Protein Synthesis in Humans



The following study investigated whether ingestion of protein with carbohydrates after a two hour cycle exercise would increase muscle protein synthesis by measuring subjects’ muscle fractional synthetic rate (FSR) and whole body net protein balance (WBNB). All six athletes showed increase muscle FSR and improved WBNB when coingesting carbohydrates and proteins versus carbohydrates alone, signifying improved muscle protein synthesis. 

Howarth, K., et al. (2008), ‘Coingestion of Protein with Carbohydrate During Recovery From Endurance Exercise Stimulates Skeletal Muscle Protein Synthesis in Humans’, Journal of Applied Physiology, vol. 106, no. 4, pp. 1394-1402. 

Convenient to use.

AmaMax Rush can be used by anyone who exercises. Whether you’re someone who likes to stay active or are training for the next Olympics, Rush will help you recover faster so you’re ready to tackle your next workout with your best performance. 

AmaMax Rush is packaged in a recyclable pouch with a re-sealable cap, making it easy to use before, during, and after exercise. 

Super grain Amaranth for super recovery.

Working hand in hand with Amaranth Australia we are able to deliver AmaMax Rush to you with all of the whole grain goodness of Amaranth.

Amaranth is an ancient super grain that was relied on by the Aztecs for over 5000 years for its nutritional and medical benefits. Today, we continue to use Amaranth for these same reasons. Amaranth is entirely gluten-free and contains a complete protein - including all the essential amino acids. Amaranth is also high in fiber and a good source of magnesium and iron, making it the perfect core ingredient for AmaMax Rush. 

See what we’re made of.

In addition to using pure Amaranth flour, we opted to only use naturally sourced, wholesome ingredients that provide an optimal blend of nutrition for maximal recovery. 

We’re proud of each ingredient we use and believe that you deserve to be completely informed, so feel free to browse the table below. You’ll find every ingredient that’s used in Rush listed along with our reason for using it and where it’s sourced.

Rush packs are free of trans-fats, hydrogenated oils, high fructose corn syrup, artificial sweeteners, artificial flavors, and artificial preservatives.

Rush is made entirely free of gluten, soy, and nuts.

To address any other allergen-related questions, please contact us at info@amamax.com.au

Nutrition Facts Label:

Tastes delicious – we really mean it.

We’re big on flavor. That’s why we tested Rush for the past three years with hundreds of athletes from around the world to get the taste just right.

Using real cocoa, sugar, and small amounts of fats we were able to achieve a delicious chocolaty taste without adding any fillers or artificial sweeteners.

AmaMax Rush resembles the same consistency and taste as a chocolate mousse dessert making it easy to eat on the go without the need for water like many energy gels and bars require.

Here’s what some of our testers have to say about Rush:

I recently finished running 7 marathons in 7 days in 7 cities for the Bravehearts foundation. I don’t usually do this much exercise and I am not what you would consider a typical athlete. Although it was difficult I found that AmaMax Rush assisted me to recover faster, get up the next day and complete the next marathon. I also took it during each race at the 20km mark which helped to keep my energy levels up and maintain my pace. I managed to average a little over 4hrs across the 7 marathons. My level of muscle soreness was significantly reduced due to the AmaMax Rush and I would endorse the product to anyone who exercises to use it for recovery.

I am not an athlete.

I am the weekend warrior personified – 42 years old, a bike ride of between 70 and 100km on Sunday mornings, usually in the hills, with a couple of rpm classes during the week.

Things were not looking good for the Challenge Tour on 20 January – 138km of riding through the Barossa Valleys. I had had 3 weeks off the bike and the Tour was 2 ½ weeks away.  I was not at all confident.

I decided to use AmaMax Rush as a recovery food to give my legs a chance over the next 17 days.

With an AmaMax the night before, I do the 138 km in 4 hours and 50 minutes. I am more than happy with that.  I was able to maintain the training regime off a pretty poor fitness base and notwithstanding that low starting point, recovered surprisingly quickly between each ride.  That is the first time that I had incorporated AmaMax into a training regime.

Of course, if you spend almost 5 hours in the saddle after only a couple of weeks’ training, you are going to end up with a sore backside.  The AmaMax didn’t fix that.

Hi Bennett,

Charity ride to Melbourne from Adelaide.
We got back Friday at about 2 PM after 1050 kilometers. Everything went very well including topping up with your recovery food, AmaMax Rush.

I think about 16 out of the 18 guys tried it and about 8-10 had multiple servings. Personally I had about 4 servings finding it to be a great snack just after lunch as a kind of dessert. I don't know if it was the AmaMax but I found enough energy to come home each day quite strongly.

Thank you so much in your support of our trip. We raised over $24,000 for the Woman’s & Children’s Hospital and your support helped make it happen.

Kindest regards,

Hi Bennett,

After using AmaMax Rush for a couple of months, I’ve noticed a solid improvement in my recovery time. Boasting a full amino acid profile, a smooth chocolate taste and packed full of carbohydrates, Rush is the ultimate recovery food that athletes of all standards should utilise. I recommend Rush to anyone looking to take their recovery to the next level.

I find AmaMax Rush makes not just a great inter-race snack but also a perfect meal replacement. It sits really well in the stomach and tastes great! It's also great to know you are consuming something with a complete range of amino acids and complex nutritious carbohydrates. When competing at the top level it is these little things that make a big difference.

AmaMax is both tasty and nutritious making it a stand-out choice for loading and recovery. As an Australian Kayak Rep I am constantly needing more to fuel my body, and with AmaMax I feel the improvement that it provides with its dense value of carbohydrates and aminos. I recommend any person wanting better health and recovery to try it.

 The Simple Truth About Sugars.

The simple sugars used in AmaMax Rush are essential for the post exercise meal. Simple sugars help in two major ways:

1. They assist in inhibiting cortisol (an insulin blocker) by creating a large insulin rise.
2. They also assist in replenishing glycogen within the liver and muscle.

Both the rise in insulin and replenishment of glycogen are a result of eating high-Glycemic Index (GI) foods, a necessity for achieving optimal recovery immediately following exercise. However it is important to understand that not all sugars are equal and some are better than others. While Fructose is one of the worst at creating a high insulin rise with a GI of just 29, Glucose is the best with a GI of 99. AmaMax Rush contains pure Glucose plus other simple sugars to ensure your recovery is maximised.

100% Made in Australia.

When Bennett Maxwell mixed up the first batches of AmaMax Rush in his kitchen, he used a Cuisinart mixer. Things have come a long way since then and now every package of Rush will be made in world-class facilities, right here in Melbourne, Australia.

Our facility adheres to the most stringent quality standards, so you can rest assured that each Rush pack is made exactly like it is intended. Mass production of Rush will be monitored for safety and quality by checking each and every batch.

Our manufacturer is experienced with high-volume production quantities and has the capacity to meet any demand, so that your order will always be met.


The inspiration to create a new kind of recovery food all started shortly after my first daughter was born, who I believed at the time to have a gluten intolerance. As a sports scientist, I immediately began searching for a gluten-free food source that would provide
story_txt:
Finalized version of AmaMax Rush is exclusively available through Indiegogo at a limited time discount in the U.S., Australia, and Canada.
Formulated with an optimal 3.5:1 ratio of high quality carbohydrates and proteins derived from the Amaranth super grain, pure whey protein isolates and other natural ingredients.
Tastes great – just like a chocolate mousse dessert. We tested over 3,000 sample packs of AmaMax Rush with people from around the globe to get the taste just right.
Free of gluten, soy, nuts, and trans fats.
We're sponsoring three up-and-coming athletes with full-year supplies of AmaMax Rush. 

AmaMax Rush is a delicious recovery food that combines the latest in nutritional research with the super grain Amaranth and other natural ingredients to reduce recovery time following exercise. 


The truth is many of us don’t get a combination of both proteins and carbohydrates before, during, and after exercises, when this is exactly what we need to perform at our best. 
AmaMax Rush delivers just that. It’s the culmination of five years of the latest in nutritional research and testing to provide the most functional sports recovery food on the planet. And at the heart of it all are its ingredients. Made using natural gluten-free ingredients and the super grain Amaranth, AmaMax Rush fuels you with the nutrients you need to perform at your peak, recover faster and live healthier. 
The Science. 
We developed Rush with a scientifically-proven 3.5:1 ratio of high-quality carbohydrates and proteins derived from the Amaranth grain and other natural ingredients, to deliver an array of recovery and health benefits.
The following chart shows the main differences between proteins (PRO) alone or carbohydrates (CHO) alone versus a combination of proteins and carbohydrates found in AmaMax Rush:



Ivy, J., Portman, R. (2004), ‘Nutrient Timing: The Future of
Sports Nutrition’, Basic Health
Publications Inc., table 5.1, pp. 64. 

Unlike other leading energy bars, gels and sports drinks,
AmaMax Rush is proven to offer significant advantages in reducing muscle
damage, speeding muscle recovery, enhancing endurance, and boosting healthy immune
function. All of these exercise performance benefits from consuming
carbohydrates and proteins together are backed by numerous research
studies.Effects of Recovery
Beverages on Glycogen Restoration and Endurance Exercise Performance
In this study eight endurance-trained cyclists were each
given high carbohydrate-protein (CHO-PRO) beverages and traditional
all-carbohydrate (AC) beverages immediately and two hours after two two-hour trial
rides. Ingestion of the CHO-PRO beverage resulted in a 17% greater plasma
glucose response, a 92% greater insulin response, and a 128% greater storage of
muscle glycogen compared to the AC beverage. These findings demonstrate that
the rate of recovery is coupled with the rate of muscle glycogen replenishment
and suggest that CHO-PRO recovery supplements should be consumed to optimize
muscle recovery.
Williams, M. et al. (2003), ‘Effects of Recovery Beverages
on Glycogen Restoration and Endurance Exercise Performance’, Journal of Strength and Conditioning
Research, vol. 17, no. 1, pp. 12-19.
The Effect of
Carbohydrate and Protein Supplement on Resistance Exercise Performance,
Hormonal Response, and Muscle Damage
The study used 34 male subjects to determine whether
resistance exercise performance and post-exercise muscle damage were altered
when consuming a carbohydrate and protein beverage. Each subject performed
three sets of eight repetitions at their eight repetition maximum to fatigue
for multiple exercises. The results demonstrated that the CHO-PRO supplement reduced
muscle damage and soreness, as evidenced by the elevated response levels of
both myoglobin and creatine kinase.
Baty, J. et al. (2007), ‘The Effect of Carbohydrate and
Protein Supplement on Resistance Exercise Performance, Hormonal Response, and
Muscle Damage’, Journal of Strength and
Conditioning Research, vol. 21, no. 2, pp. 321-329. 

Effect of a
Carbohydrate-Protein Supplement on Endurance Performance During Exercise of
Varying Intensity

In this study nine trained cyclists were given
carbohydrate-protein 
(CHO-PRO) 
beverages and all-carbohydrate (AC) beverages to
compare the effects. Athletes were given supplements every 20 minutes during
three separate testing trials. Carbohydrate supplementation was found to
significantly increase the time to exhaustion, while the addition of protein
enhanced the effect of the carbohydrate supplement. Therefore, the addition of
protein leads to an improved insulin response of a carbohydrate supplement,
resulting in improved aerobic endurance performance.


Ivy, J. et al. (2003), ‘Effect of a Carbohydrate-Protein
Supplement on Endurance Performance During Exercise of Varying Intensity’, International Journal of Sport Nutrition and
Exercise Metabolism, vol. 13, pp. 382-395.


Coingestion of
Protein with Carbohydrate During Recovery From Endurance Exercise Stimulates
Skeletal Muscle Protein Synthesis in Humans


The following study investigated whether ingestion of
protein with carbohydrates after a two hour cycle exercise would increase
muscle protein synthesis by measuring subjects’ muscle fractional synthetic
rate (FSR) and whole body net protein balance (WBNB). All six athletes showed
increase muscle FSR and improved WBNB when coingesting carbohydrates and
proteins versus carbohydrates alone, signifying improved muscle protein synthesis. 


Howarth, K., et al. (2008), ‘Coingestion of Protein with
Carbohydrate During Recovery From Endurance Exercise Stimulates Skeletal Muscle
Protein Synthesis in Humans’, Journal of
Applied Physiology, vol. 106, no. 4, pp. 1394-1402. 

Convenient to use.
AmaMax Rush can be used by anyone who exercises. Whether you’re someone who likes to stay active or are training for the next Olympics, Rush will help you recover faster so you’re ready to tackle your next workout with your best performance. 
AmaMax Rush is packaged in a recyclable pouch with a re-sealable
cap, making it easy to use before, during, and after exercise. 



Super grain Amaranth for super recovery.
Working hand in hand with Amaranth Australia we are able to
deliver AmaMax Rush to you with all of the whole grain goodness of Amaranth. 

Amaranth is an ancient super grain that was relied on by the
Aztecs for over 5000 years for its nutritional and medical benefits. Today, we
continue to use Amaranth for these same reasons. Amaranth is entirely
gluten-free and contains a complete protein - including all the essential amino
acids. Amaranth is also high in fiber and a good source of magnesium and iron,
making it the perfect core ingredient for AmaMax Rush. 
See what we’re made of. 
In addition to using pure Amaranth flour, we opted to only
use naturally sourced, wholesome ingredients that provide an optimal blend of
nutrition for maximal recovery.  

We’re proud of each ingredient we use and believe that you
deserve to be completely informed, so feel free to browse the table below.
You’ll find every ingredient that’s used in Rush listed along with our reason
for using it and where it’s sourced. 

Rush packs are free of trans-fats, hydrogenated
oils, high fructose corn syrup, artificial sweeteners, artificial flavors, and
artificial preservatives. 
Rush is made entirely free of gluten, soy, and nuts. 


To address any other allergen-related questions, please
contact us at info@amamax.com.au
Nutrition Facts Label:

Tastes delicious – we really mean it.
We’re big on flavor. That’s why we
tested Rush for the past three years with hundreds of athletes from
around the world to get the taste just right. 
Using real cocoa, sugar, and small
amounts of fats we were able to achieve a delicious chocolaty taste without
adding any fillers or artificial sweeteners.

AmaMax Rush resembles the same
consistency and taste as a chocolate mousse dessert making it easy to eat on the go without the need for
water like many energy gels and bars require. 
Here’s what some of our testers
have to say about Rush:

story:
Beast is available on the market! Now You can buy Beast on www.thisisbeast.com

Thanks to all our backers we were able to complete and deliver all our orders. 


On Press:

    

            

"This is gold for Fitness Enthusiasts"

"Beast will revolution the world of Fitness"

"Beast data about strength training is real-time and easy to read"

"Aerospace Engineering technology applied to strength training"

"Beast the Best for Training"


        

Check our website www.thisisbeast.com

Grow your muscles faster with the First Sensor to track Fitness Training and visualize results in real-time, suitable for all exercises. 


                          REAL TIME VISUALIZATION DURING WORKOUT!




Beast shows you in real-time how much you are pushing, rep by rep, whether you are lifting weights, using a machine or performing bodyweight exercises. You can chose to visualize Speed, Power or Strength and monitor your performance live while working out. You can review your results while resting between each set and receive indications about how to make your training more effective: for example the Beast App accesses all your data to suggest optimal weight to use or the number of reps to perform to reach your training goal faster!

             

More than just a feeling or visual feedback: Quantifying your movements is essential to reach better results. By measuring exactly the efforts you perform in the gym, Beasts tracks your improvement and helps you training better. Moreover, it gives you the overview of all workout data collected so far, keeping a diary of your performance and checking how effective each training is.

_________________________________________________________________________

    AN ACCURATE PERFORMANCE MEASUREMENT SYSTEM, MADE EASY        _________________________________________________________________________

First of all, data about your movements is acquired with 50 Hz: this means, for all of your movements, you have 50 measurements per second!

To achieve the a higher level of measurement reliability, and to perform each possible exercise, the Beast sensor is configured as a small magnet, which enables it to be easily plugged on barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells or gym machines and to the body itself for performing free body exercises with the Beast Vest (see below)

_________________________________________________________________________

                  BEAST GOES TO BRAZIL: SOCCER WORLD CUP 2014!

_________________________________________________________________________

Even for high level soccer players, it is important to track and monitor their condition: for this reason Beast Beta release has been selected - and is currently used - by the Italian National Soccer Team. Beast is monitoring performance of players training for the Soccer World Cup starting at Rio De Janeiro on 12th of June! Thanks to the Italian Soccer Team S&C Coaches supporting us developing and validating Beast, and to our exceptional beta testers!!

(For more information check our local press: http://www.figc.it/it/204/39025/2014/02/News.shtml)


_________________________________________________________________________

   USABILITY MAXIMIZED   

_________________________________________________________________________

BEAST is magnetic. So you can use it with all kinds of weights, barbells, dumbbells, kettlebells, ropes, tires, for body weight exercises or with any gym machine! No need for sci-lab equipment to measure your performances anymore!


              WEIGHTS                             FREE - BODY                     GYM MACHINES

_________________________________________________________________________

           THE MOST RELEVANT PARAMETERS TO TRACK TRAINING

_________________________________________________________________________          

_________________________________________________________________________

STRENGTH: more strength means more load. And more load means more muscles!

SPEED: is the key-differentiator for training: a body-builder needs to train slowly, an athlete needs to train fast!

POWER: knowing the power of your movements makes your training effective

EXPLOSIVENESS:  you can defeat all your opponents applying force faster!

_________________________________________________________________________

1) Connect sensor to weights, machines or to free body

2) Select Training goal, Exercise and Load on the beast App

3) Start your workout!

_________________________________________________________________________

                                       CHOOSE YOUR TRAINING GOAL!

_________________________________________________________________________

What is your training objective? Let Beast know and Beast will tell you if you are doing your exercise correctly! Theory of training has been transferred into software to give real time indications, as for example the color of the bar, to increase effectiveness and reduce wasted effort!

Get your athletic evaluation instantly! After each exercise performed, Beast tells you how much you´ve worked to improve your Strength, Power, Velocity, Resistance and Explosiveness.

                     

Get your athletic evaluation instantly! After each exercise performed, Beast tells you how much you´ve worked to improve your Strength, Power, Velocity, Resistance and Explosiveness.                

Live Monitor: visualize in real-time your Strength on smartphone. Great for quick movement analysis and applicable even on field! 

Challenge a friend with the Multiplayer Mode! If another mate has Beast, you can connect to his phone and start a challenge.

Train - and monitor trainings - with distance! As soon as workouts are completed, they will be synced with the Beast server, so training completion can also be monitored by trainers with distance.

_________________________________________________________________________

                            WORKOUT PARAMETERS TRACKED

_________________________________________________________________________

_________________________________________________________________________

LOG INTO THE BEAST WEB PORTAL AND SEE YOUR PROGRESS IN TIME!

_________________________________________________________________________

you can access it here: www.thisisbeast.com/users/sign_in

DATA IS THE VALUE! All gathered data helps to improve your training: on this base Beast calculates your 1RM,  creates your muscular profile and suggests you the best training loads.

With your Beast Web Portal account, you can review and analyze all moments of your workouts done so far, up to single rep! You can periodize your training creating workout routines and send them directly to your smartphone, add new exercises and compete with friends!

Gather information about how intense you are training day-by-day and week-by-week. You can chose one exercise and monitor the progress in that single exercise, moreover you can compare results with your friends or team mates!

Visualize exactly every single Repetition, your averagely lifting volume and how your records evolve in time! 

HIGH PRECISION MOVEMENT ANALYSIS

For PROs: make a detailed analysis of your movements!


_______________________________________________________________________

       THE BEAST SENSOR              _______________________________________________________________________

         

  • Bluetooth 4.0 (LE Bluetooth or Bluetooth Smart)
  • 50 measurements per second
  • Rugged Case
  • magnetic attach system
  • 40 grams, 20x15x45mm
  • IPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S; IPod Touch, IPad  and IPad mini and Android devices with LE Bluetooth 

_________________________________________________________________________

                                          ACCESSORIES FOR BEAST

_________________________________________________________________________

Perchmount Fit: a comfortable magnetic support to plug your smartphone where you can always see it while working out! It turns all machines into monitoring devices!

 

Beast vest: enables all free body exercises - jumps included!

Beast bracelet, helps you as well carrying the Beast sensor around in gym

      

_________________________________________________________________________

DATA & ALGORITHM VALIDATION

_________________________________________________________________________

At the department of Applied Mechanics of Politecnico di Milano - Italy highest ranked university of technology - we compared data with a Celesco linear encoder to validate measurements and results: the drift of the speed signal which is typical of accelerometers & gyroscopes instruments has been completely removed, enabling tracking and visualization of all reps in real-time. 


_________________________________________________________________________

                                                       WHO WE ARE

_________________________________________________________________________

Tommaso, CTO - Player of Italian National American Football Team, ISSA certified Personal S&C coach and BSc in Aerospace Engineering

Vittorio, CEO - Aerospace Engineer, software and project management, fitness enthusiast and windsurfer! 

Lucio, COO - Aerospace Engineer expert in MEMS Sensor Systems and signal elaboration Algorithms, the Data Scientist

                  

_________________________________________________________________________

F.A.Q. - FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

_________________________________________________________________________

- How can I set up to use the Beast sensor once I receive it?

Install the Beast App on your smartphone, sign up on our portal with your account, connect the sensor via Bluetooth and start your workout!

- How can I connect Beast to my smartphone?

Beast takes advantage of the Bluetooth low energy technology, after you have logged in the app with your profile, you can choose your sensor and connect to it just tapping on the screen, the connection interval is super fast!

- How does the magnetic connection work?

Inside the Beast case there’s a strong magnet. You can simply get your sensor close to every gym equipment and Beast links on it. Also our body vest it’s made to take advantage of magnetic connection, so you can do the same with it.

- How do I charge the Beast sensor?

You can charge your Beast sensor with micro USB cable using your computer or any USB charger.

- How long does the battery last?

The battery is designed to last for 5-7 workouts, depending on workout duration.

- How does the sensor recognize my movements?

Beast uses a combination of inertial sensors (accelerometer, gyroscope and magnetometer) that can support each other to detect every movement in 3D space. Our patented algorithm is specifically made to calculate in real time Force, Speed, Power and Explosiveness of every exercise and to automatically count every repetition you make.

- Is it possible to use the sensor on my wrist just like a common wearable device?

Of course you can! We designed a tailor made bracelet for Beast sensor to let you use it just like a ‘traditional’ wearable device.

- Which smartphones will Beast support?

The Beast app is working on IOS devices (IPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S; IPod Touch, IPad  and IPad mini with Bluetooth 4.0 technology) and all Android devices which are Bluetooth 4.0 Enabled.

- What is the difference between Beast and other fitness trackers?

Beast sensor is the first device that guarantees high level real time scientific measurements necessary to match the expectations of professional strength and conditioning coaches and athletes. The magnetic system lets you put it not only on your arm or wrist but on every gym equipment to correctly track every exercise you make, and on your body vest as well! Ultimately, the very simple user interface is suitable for every kind of user, professional athlete or not: Beast is made with athlets and coaches but is thought for everyone who likes to train!

- How can I get in touch with the Beast Team?

You can contact us at info@beast-technologies.com. Our team will be happy to help you!

Follow us on:

www.facebook.com/beastsensor

www.twitter.com/beastsensor

www.instagram.com/beastsensor

www.tumblr.com/beastsensor

Check out our website! www.thisisbeast.com

After each exercise performed, Beast tells you how much you´ve worked to improve your Strength, Power, Velocity, Resistance and Explosiveness.                Live Monitor: visualize in real-time your Strength on smartphone. Great for quick movement analysis and applicable even on field! Challenge a friend with the Multiplayer Mode! If another mate has Beast, you can connect to his phone and start a challenge.Train - and monitor trainings - with distance! As soon as workouts are completed, they will be synced with the Beast server, so training completion can also be monitored by trainers with distance._________________________________________________________________________                            WORKOUT PARAMETERS TRACKED__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________LOG INTO THE BEAST WEB PORTAL AND SEE YOUR PROGRESS IN TIME!_________________________________________________________________________you can access it here: www.thisisbeast.com/users/sign_inDATA IS THE VALUE! All gathered data helps to improve your training: on this base Beast calculates your 1RM,  creates your muscular profile and suggests you the best training loads.With your Beast Web Portal account, you can review and analyze all moments of your workouts done so far, up to single rep! You can periodize your training creating workout routines and send them directly to your smartphone, add new exercises and compete with friends!Gather information about how intense you are training day-by-day and week-by-week. You can chose one exercise and monitor the progress in that single exercise, moreover you can compare results with your friends or team mates!Visualize exactly every single Repetition, your averagely lifting volume and how your records evolve in time! HIGH PRECISION MOVEMENT ANALYSISFor PROs: make a detailed analysis of your movements!_______________________________________________________________________       THE BEAST SENSOR              _______________________________________________________________________         

Bluetooth 4.0 (LE Bluetooth or Bluetooth Smart)


50 measurements per second


Rugged Case


magnetic attach system


40 grams, 20x15x45mm

IPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S; IPod Touch, IPad  and IPad mini and Android devices with LE Bluetooth 
_________________________________________________________________________                                          ACCESSORIES FOR BEAST_________________________________________________________________________Perchmount Fit: a comfortable magnetic support to plug your smartphone where you can always see it while working out! It turns all machines into monitoring devices! Beast vest: enables all free body exercises - jumps included!Beast bracelet, helps you as well carrying the Beast sensor around in gym      _________________________________________________________________________DATA & ALGORITHM VALIDATION_________________________________________________________________________At the department of Applied Mechanics of Politecnico di Milano - Italy highest ranked university of technology - we compared data with a Celesco linear encoder to validate measurements and results: the drift of the speed signal which is typical of accelerometers & gyroscopes instruments has been completely removed, enabling tracking and visualization of all reps in real-time. _________________________________________________________________________                                                       WHO WE ARE_________________________________________________________________________Tommaso, CTO - Player of Italian National American Football Team, ISSA certified Personal S&C coach and BSc in Aerospace EngineeringVittorio, CEO - Aerospace Engineer, software and project management, fitness enthusiast and windsurfer! Lucio, COO - Aerospace Engineer expert in MEMS Sensor Systems and signal elaboration Algorithms, the Data Scientist                  _________________________________________________________________________F.A.Q. - FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS_________________________________________________________________________
- How can I
set up to use the Beast sensor once I receive it?
Install the
Beast App on your smartphone, sign up on our portal with your account, connect
the sensor via Bluetooth and start your workout!
- How can I
connect Beast to my smartphone?
Beast takes
advantage of the Bluetooth low energy technology, after you have logged in the
app with your profile, you can choose your sensor and connect to it just
tapping on the screen, the connection interval is super fast! 
- How does
the magnetic connection work?
Inside the
Beast case there’s a strong magnet. You can simply get your sensor close to
every gym equipment and Beast links on it. Also our body vest it’s made to take
advantage of magnetic connection, so you can do the same with it.
- How do I
charge the Beast sensor?
You can
charge your Beast sensor with micro USB cable using your computer or any USB
charger.
- How long
does the battery last?
The battery
is designed to last for 5-7 workouts, depending on workout duration.
- How does
the sensor recognize my movements?
Beast uses
a combination of inertial sensors (accelerometer, gyroscope and magnetometer)
that can support each other to detect every movement in 3D space. Our patented
algorithm is specifically made to calculate in real time Force, Speed, Power
and Explosiveness of every exercise and to automatically count every repetition
you make.
- Is it
possible to use the sensor on my wrist just like a common wearable device?
Of course
you can! We designed a tailor made bracelet for Beast sensor to let you use it
just like a ‘traditional’ wearable device.
- Which
smartphones will Beast support?
The Beast
app is working on IOS devices (IPhone 4S, 5, 5C, 5S; IPod Touch, IPad  and IPad mini with Bluetooth 4.0 technology)
and all Android devices which are Bluetooth 4.0 Enabled.
- What is
the difference between Beast and other fitness trackers?
Beast
sensor is the first device that guarantees high level real time scientific
measurements necessary to match the expectations of professional strength and
conditioning coaches and athletes. The magnetic system lets you put it not only
on your arm or wrist but on every gym equipment to correctly track every exercise
you make, and on your body vest as well! Ultimately, the very simple user
interface is suitable for every kind of user, professional athlete or not: Beast
is made with athlets and coaches but is thought for everyone who likes to train!
- How can I
get in touch with the Beast Team?
You can contact
us at info@beast-technologies.com. Our team will be happy to help
you!
Follow us on:
www.facebook.com/beastsensor
www.twitter.com/beastsensor
www.instagram.com/beastsensor
www.tumblr.com/beastsensor
Check out our website! www.thisisbeast.com

story:
What happened:

As some of you may know, our bud Charlie was in a serious bike accident in the summer. They were hit by a car and flew from their bike landing really hard on their left side and losing consciousness. As a result they suffered serious nerve damage and were in severe pain afterwards with very little mobility. While the initial effects of the injury have lessened since the accident they still have intense daily pain radiating from their hips.

Soon after the accident, Charlie started to try to get coverage from their American insurance or the SAAQ for their medical bills which were starting to really pile up. What resulted afterwards has been a very long and frustrating legal battle where the system has refused to help Charlie out. They haven’t been able to see a doctor since the accident and in the meantime their injuries are going untreated.

It’s been more than four months since the accident and we’re getting really worried about the long term effects of leaving Charlie’s injuries untreated. They are working full time at a job which is also quite physically demanding and has a very long commute. The toll this is taking on their body is exacerbating their underlying injuries.

What's needed:

This is bullshit!! They really should be getting some help for their body after such a serious accident. Let’s not let Charlie continue to suffer because all the bureaucracies around them are too messed up to care.

Charlie needs physiotherapy. Despite having a full time job, between rent and bills they really can’t afford it on their own. Therefore we’re organizing this fundraiser for them. We’ve estimated they need around $500 for intake and 6 sessions of treatment. All money raised from this campaign will go straight towards those bills. Also, I’m organizing some amazing rewards for different amounts of cash donations.

But hey, there are lots of amazing folks out there who are unable to give cash and we really don’t want to put pressure on anyone. Only give money if you can, and we are grateful for any amount that is ok for you.

Note:

This campaign is being organized by Tali, Morgan, and Cee on Charlie’s behalf with their permission.

About Charlie:

Charlie (they/them) is a white genderqueer person living in Montreal.  They're a pretty great artist, a super loving friend, and they have great style.

Pixel Portrait of Charlie by Morgan Sea (Get your own pixel portrait with a $50 perk on the right!)

story:
Ongoing work is needed at the GGP Disc Golf Course

  • We need tier work on #11/#16
  • Removing trash from trash cans on all holes
  • Finish the great wall on #6.
  • Add Drain rock to all the tees in need
  • There are more tee signs to be replaced
  • Constant maintenance due to ever-increasing foot traffic as daily new disc golfers explore their obsession
  • The necessarily vigilant watch over erosion spots on the course

What we need:

Support through funding to keep the workers on the course part/full-time, providing for and serving the rapidly growing disc golf community in San Francisco and the greater Northern California region.

Through their tireless work and dedication, the Golden Gate Park Disc Golf Course will be the premiere free public course in the United States and the standard by which all other courses, private and public, will be judged in the future.

We've made great strides!

Planting grass in numerous locations to stop and control Erosion on our sand based course.

Purchased a truck to use for hauling and course maintainence, its already earned its place in the SFDGC Fam.

  • Erosion control on pathway on Hole 12
  • Drain rock placed around teepads #11 and #12 to stop flooding and mud tees.
  • The TEMPLE structure on Hole #11
  • The "Great Wall" on hole #6
  • Improved teebox area on #12

Drastically reduced play-through times on 11, 12, 14 with proper maintenance of the hill side.That is now covered in GRASS!!!

New Tee Signs!

More seating!

Erosion control tier on 18 to save main tree by the C pin.

...and last but certainly not least the course is continuing to get more GREEN!

story:
Summary

Sigma Alpha Iota is a music business fraternity for women. The Eta Mu Chapter at University of Hartford chooses a special cause each year on which to focus its fundraising efforts. The fundraising is culminated with a Benefit for Life concert, featuring SAI sisters, other students from the university, and outside guests.

This year's Benefit funds will be donated to the

Lung Cancer Research Foundation.

Lung Cancer Research Foundation (LCRF) is a nonprofit organization that supports research on innovative strategies for better treatments, screening, and prevention of all cancers of the lung. Our goal is to fund promising scientific and clinical research initiatives that will lead to more positive outcomes and improved quality of life for all lung cancer patients.

For more information about this organization, please visit their website here.


Why LCRF?

This year we chose this cause to support members of Eta Mu who have lost loved ones to lung cancer. We hope to make a significant donation to LCRF to support research and to help improve the lives of those affected by lung cancer.

The Impact

  • 1.3 million people die from lung cancer each year.
  • Lung cancer is responsible for 1/3 of all cancer-related deaths.
  • Each year, more people die of lung cancer than of colon, breast, and prostate cancers combined.

Benefit for Life Concert

MARCH 7TH, 7:00 PM
LINCOLN THEATER @ U. OF HARTFORD

story:
In Loving Memory of Marilyn Legge   

My cousin Cameron’s wonderful Mother, Marilyn Legge suddenly passed away peacefully on the morning of October 19th 2013 in her sleep at the young age of 55. It came as a shock to everyone. It is believed she likely had a heart attack while she was sleeping. My cousin found her lifeless body when he awoke in the morning. It is such a terrible tragedy for a 23 year old to have to endure. He has witnessed so much tragedy for such a young person. His strength is remarkable. Marilyn was the proud Mother of Cameron & Kris Legge and a caring Grandmother of Kole, Siera and Brayden. Marilyn was loved by all that knew her, she will be sorely missed. 

 

Please Contribute to The Cause

For those of you who had the privilege of knowing Marilyn either personally or through Facebook, please consider making a contribution. Every little bit helps.

Money is being raised to help Cameron cover the cost of cremation and funeral home fees.

Any additional proceeds will be put towards a future memorial service for Marilyn, a celebration of life.    

 Thank you so much!

Much love

story:
”Now talking smack is easier than ever…Finally, a fan centric service is available above and beyond just sports statistics and mindless chatter, SmackTalk360™ is a dynamic platform for sports fans to connect with their favorite teams, express opinions play by play, challenge counterparts during sporting events, and banter live in competitive 'smack' talk. This one-stop digital destination is every sports fan’s dream!” – Allan Sabo, Founder, e-Sports.com



SmackTalk360™ - The Ultimate Sports Platform
SmackTalk360 was humbly developed a few years ago when a group of sports fans and technology enthusiasts talked about how cool it would be to build a platform to “talk smack" about sports, with friends and rivals – anyplace, anytime, anywhere. From there, came the idea of actually earning points on the smack talk that would be redeemable for sports merchandise and more. Then came the “noise wall” to follow what everyone was talking about, especially during the World Series, Super bowl, NBA Finals, fantasy draft, etc. Followed by more awesome features, and where you could use it at, and what all it could do. But then we only got so far as a 1.0 beta version before our resources ran out…and that’s why we need your help to finalize our vision and complete your sports technology dream come true! 



"Float like a butterfly and sting like a bee, he can't hit what he can't see."
- Muhammad Ali



SmackTalk360 Build Out - Raising Funds to Get it Done!
The multi-featured web, tablet, and mobile platform includes robust capabilities that allow fans to connect in real-time; allowing interaction before, during, and after a sporting event. The system allows fanatics to do everything sports, including “Challenging” friends, "Cheering" and "Booing" to earn points, going head-to-head in sports trivia, viewing team schedules and stadium check-ins, and much, much more! Our goal is to develop a platform full of dynamic features and content that includes all sports around the globe, accessible anytime, by anyone, and from anywhere! So please help us make our vision possible. With resources, we can finish the 1.0 version just in time for this football season and then construct the more robust 2.0 version. We can make the Superbowl a fun interactive platform experience for all to enjoy.

Your funds will help us with:

  • Hire local developers to add robust features
  • Marketing dollars to gain users, community outreach
  • Brand expansion



"We're going to win. I guarantee it." - Joe Namath



Making the World a Better Place - Through Sports!
In today's world, sports is actually proven to be healthy for your mind, spirit and event motivates people to get out and get moving. Studies have shown that people have higher self esteem, avoid being lonely and create instant connections and communities through sports. Our goal at ST360 is to create the ULTIMATE Sports platform to engage, interact and participate 24/7 and make it especially exciting during live events to talk smack and have fun. There is nothing controversial about sports, it's fun, it’s a good ole tradition to cheer on your team and share your passion and loyalty! Sports keep people motivated, happy and make us feel good, especially when your team wins! So help us make the world a little better and create the ultimate fan experience.



"If he calls, I'll be sure to pick up after the fifth ring." -Kobe Bryant






THANK YOU!!

We want each and every one of you to know that we appreciate your support, please see the side bar for your contribution rewards.

If you can't contribute please spread the word and share this campaign with all your sport fan friends. 

Please feel free to contact us for more information at info@smacktalk360.com  (general inquires, press, partnerships, etc).


Most Graciously,
#ST360

story:
Top Questions

What is Skull Shaver and Horizontal Shavers?

It was almost 85 years ago Col. Jacob Schick invented and patented the first electric shaver. Skull Shaver makes a dramatic yet simple change in the design of electric shavers which is more compatible with human anatomy. Our patented design allows firmer grip and gliding mode for easy access to hard to reach areas of head and body. Please see the pictures and videos.

Are you offering these shavers for the first time?

We have done one previous trial production run of Skull Shaver.  The Original Skull Shaver was very well received by the consumers and we were overwhelmed by the positive reviews given by the independent newspaper articles, radio shows and other media, as well as by real consumers on websites like Amazon. Original Skull Shaver offers an excellent value. To make it even more powerful we have added more guts and features to the shaver. And we are generously rewarding our loyal customers by not only having over 50% discount on the new models pre-orders here at Indiegogo but also giving them away two very useful accessories worth up to $50 with pre-order. See Details. We are in pursuit of making these shavers an excellent new choice of highly knowledgeable consumers.

Why is the much superior new model offered here is less expensive than the original model?

One of the main attraction of original Skull Shaver is its beautiful and practical patented design which is very effective to maintain and sport bald look and for woman to cover large areas fast with dry shave.Our highly acclaimed design stays the same. Anyone who wants to enjoy Skull Shaver can get it from our website or Amazon. You get instant gratification. Any one who has Skull Shaver will also get two additional accessories free with their pre-order at Indiegogo. See Details . However, we have added some real additional useful features in new models i.e more powerful battery and motor, waterproof body, cordless and corded operation, choice of differently  contoured three rotor shaver head. He will love it and she will love it. It balances out whether you want limited availability Skull Shaver now and get new model and added free accessories in December 2013 or get the new powerful model at a huge discount in December 2013.   

We are in pursuit of the perfect electric shaver!

Human Anatomy Compatible™

How Skull Shaver and  Horizontal Shavers were Born

My name is John Lyles, the inventor of Skull Shaver. The idea of designing this unique shaver came to me while traveling in Europe on business. I lived out of a suitcase for months, in and out of hotels daily. I had to get up extra early everyday just to keep my head shaved and this was becoming a real issue for me. So when I returned to the US, I began to design the perfect shaver for head grooming. That's when I started to wonder if there was a product available that would solve my problem.  It seemed like such an obvious, everyday problem that I assumed someone else had already invented something to solve it. I looked for it in department stores, drug stores and online. Surprisingly, I found nothing.  You could get shavers that state they are designed for head grooming but nothing like I had envisioned. I wanted something that was electric, allows dry shaving, can access the back of my head with ease, no mess and that would also save me hundreds of dollars on disposable razors and no more lather.

What if the funding goals are not met? Would you be producing these models?

Yes we will. Our financing cost will be a little higher. (see Updates)

I started drawing sketches of Skull Shaver. I bought molding clay at A.C. Moore to begin making simple molds of the imagined product. I was pretty satisfied with the result. I began discussing the project with some close friends. I realized that I will need more resources and skills to get the project moving. At this point my friend and business associate Neel Kulshreshtha came on board. That was almost three years ago.

Since then we went through several hurdles - prototyping in Kansas, patent work in the USA and overseas. We had to do a lot more design work in the USA for tooling and manufacturing, etc. We looked at our competition which has almost all the manufacturing done overseas and we simply could not be able to compete with them with the high manufacturing cost in the USA. We began searching for an appropriate manufacturer overseas. It had to be a quality manufacturer and the one who treats its employees with dignity and provides with fair wages and amenities. 

Shavers come with 3 or 4 or 5 Rotary Cutters Heads

This unique patented ergonomic design is the first of its kind as you can feel your skin as you shave. It makes it easy to shave hard to reach areas in the back of your head without looking in a mirror. The shaver head contours to every curve of your head, body and face as you shave. It will also eliminate cuts, nicks, bumps and irritation. Best of all - it can be used anywhere, anytime without the mess. It provides a fast and clean dry shave. Women also find it very convenient for anywhere, anytime shave!

Among family and friends, some women tried Skull Shaver on their legs. Most of them reacted very positively. Because of its large head, it shaves a much larger area faster. It also allows a dry shave. So, we realized that there is also a need for a woman's shaver with all these features.

Feel As You Shave™

The Details

We did our first trial production run of Skull Shaver with very limited resources on hand. The feedbacks have been overwhelmingly positive on design, concept and convenience. We have been featured and noticed by major newspapers and other media. Following are a few:

Philadelphia Inquirer 

 

Radio Stations  

Other Media

Top Electric Shavers

Top Ten Reviews

Despite overwhelmingly positive reviews, we are aware that a lot more has to be done to bring out the best electric shavers. We need a  strong and consistent performance of the motor, battery, and packing. We were required to learn a few more lessons in the real world school.

We went out again with more stringent manufacturing requirements to bring out the best possible electric shaver with our designs. We interviewed several potential manufacturers with our stringent manufacturing criteria as well the manufacturer’s history of its treatment of employees. We realized that we will be able to accomplish that, but it will not be cheap.

Our limited experience shows that there is a real demand for our shavers. Your pledges will allow us to do a full run of both the Bald Eagle shaver series for men and the Butterfly shaver series for women.

 This shaver will transform the way men and women shave their heads, faces and bodies.

Home of the Horizontal Shaver ™

We've listened to all the reviews, issues and concerns to make the necessary changes and upgrades. We have incorporated all the improvements in the following brand new three models:

Actual models may slightly vary from the prototype pictures.

Bald Eagle Shavers™ for Men. It comes in both Pro and Smart Series. 

Bald Eagle Pro (prototype)


Butterfly Shavers™ for Women.  Pink picture. Pro and Smart Series

 

Butterfly Pro (prototype)

 

Butterfly Shavers™ II for Women have added grooves on the sides. See blue shaver picture.  

  Butterfly Pro II (prototype)

  Pro Series Features:

  • ·  Two hour quick charge for 60 minutes usage
  • ·  Corded (mains) or cordless operation
  • ·  5 LED light screen for battery level indicator
  • ·  Washable IPX 5, wet/dry shaving
  • ·  100-240V UL certified adaptor
  • ·  Battery life charge/recharge 500 times
  • ·  Motor: 10500 RPM
  • ·  Rubberized body for grip, chromed shaver head
  • ·  Powerful motor
  • ·  On/ Off smooth switch

Detachable shaver head (optional accessory attachments will also be available)

Smart Series Features (All features of Pro plus the following)

  • LCD digital light battery level indicator
  • Compatible with our USB charger attachment (Optional)

Our MSRP for any Pro series model will be $150 and any Smart series model will be $180 

A Whole New “Bald Game”

New Normal in Electric Shaver™

Risks and Challenges

Your contributions will help us on top of the 100k in development we've already spent ourselves. We still need to begin production on the injection mold tooling, MOQs and associated advertising expenses. Indiegogo funds will go to offset these costs.

Our faith has grown stronger after we've noticed the overwhelming support for the design, concept and convenience of these shavers.

The risks of orders not being fulfilled on time is very low. No additional development is required for the Skull Shaver. The purchase orders for the production materials are written and ready to be enacted. Until this point, we have purchased trial shavers in small quantities which have significantly increased our cost per unit. Purchasing the production mold will allow us to finish the production order in larger quantities to lower our cost per unit and supply enough shavers to meet the current demand. 

 

We are in pursuit of the perfect electric shaver!
story_txt:
Top
Questions

What is Skull Shaver
and Horizontal Shavers?
It was almost 85 years ago Col. Jacob Schick invented and
patented the first electric shaver. Skull Shaver makes a dramatic yet simple
change in the design of electric shavers which is more compatible with human
anatomy. Our patented design allows firmer grip and gliding mode for easy access to hard to reach areas
of head and body. Please see the pictures and videos.
Are you offering these
shavers for the first time?
We have done one previous trial production run of Skull
Shaver.  The Original Skull Shaver was very
well received by the consumers and we were overwhelmed by the positive reviews given
by the independent newspaper articles, radio shows and other media, as well as
by real consumers on websites like Amazon. Original Skull Shaver offers an excellent value. To make it even more powerful we have added more guts and features to the shaver. And we are generously rewarding our loyal customers by not only having over 50% discount on the new models pre-orders here at Indiegogo but also giving them away two very useful accessories worth up to $50 with pre-order. See Details. We are in pursuit of making these shavers an excellent new choice of highly knowledgeable consumers.



Why is the much superior
new model offered here is less expensive than the original model?
One of the main attraction of original Skull Shaver is its beautiful and practical patented design which is very effective to maintain and sport bald look and for woman to cover large areas fast with dry shave.Our highly acclaimed design stays the same. Anyone who wants to enjoy Skull Shaver can get it from our website or Amazon. You get instant gratification. Any one who has Skull Shaver will also get two additional accessories free with their pre-order at Indiegogo. See Details . However, we have added some real additional useful features in new models i.e more powerful battery and motor, waterproof body, cordless and corded operation, choice of differently  contoured three rotor shaver head. He will love it and she will love it. It balances out whether you want limited availability Skull Shaver now and get new model and added free accessories in December 2013 or get the new powerful model at a huge discount in December 2013.   




We are in pursuit of
  the perfect electric shaver!




Human
Anatomy Compatible™






How Skull Shaver and  Horizontal Shavers were Born
My name is John Lyles, the inventor of Skull Shaver. The idea of designing this unique shaver came to me while traveling in Europe on business. I lived out of a suitcase for months, in and out of hotels daily. I had to get up extra early everyday just to keep my head shaved and this was becoming a real issue for me. So when I returned to the US, I began to design the perfect shaver for head grooming. That's when I started to wonder if there was a product available that would solve my problem.  It seemed like such an obvious, everyday problem that I assumed someone else had already invented something to solve it. I looked for it in department stores, drug stores and online. Surprisingly, I found nothing.  You could get shavers that state they are designed for head grooming but nothing like I had envisioned. I wanted something that was electric, allows dry shaving, can access the back of my head with ease, no mess and that would also save me hundreds of dollars on disposable razors and no more lather.
What if the funding goals are not met? Would you be producing these models?
Yes we will. Our financing cost will be a little higher. (see Updates)





I started drawing sketches of Skull Shaver. I bought molding clay at A.C. Moore to begin making simple molds of the imagined product. I was pretty satisfied with the result. I began discussing the project with some close friends. I realized that I will need more resources and skills to get the project moving. At this point my friend and business associate Neel Kulshreshtha came on board. That was almost three years ago.


Since then we went through several hurdles - prototyping in Kansas, patent work in the USA and overseas. We had to do a lot more design work in the USA for tooling and manufacturing, etc. We looked at our competition which has almost all the manufacturing done overseas and we simply could not be able to compete with them with the high manufacturing cost in the USA. We began searching for an appropriate manufacturer overseas. It had to be a quality manufacturer and the one who treats its employees with dignity and provides with fair wages and amenities. 



Shavers come with 3 or 4 or 5 Rotary Cutters Heads
This unique patented ergonomic design is the first of its kind as you can feel your skin as you shave. It makes it easy to shave hard to reach areas in the back of your head without looking in a mirror. The shaver head contours to every curve of your head, body and face as you shave. It will also eliminate cuts, nicks, bumps and irritation. Best of all - it can be used anywhere, anytime without the mess. It provides a fast and clean dry shave. Women also find it very convenient for anywhere, anytime shave!




Among family and friends, some women tried Skull Shaver on their legs. Most of them reacted very positively. Because of its large head, it shaves a much larger area faster. It also allows a dry shave. So, we realized that there is also a need for a woman's shaver with all these features.
Feel As You Shave™





The Details
We did our first trial production run of Skull Shaver with very limited resources on hand. The feedbacks have been overwhelmingly positive on design, concept and convenience. We have been featured and noticed by major newspapers and other media. Following are a few:

Philadelphia Inquirer 
 

Radio Stations  


Other Media
Top Electric Shavers
Top Ten Reviews
Despite overwhelmingly positive reviews, we are aware that a lot more has to be done to bring out the best electric shavers. We need a  strong and consistent performance of the motor, battery, and packing. We were required to learn a few more lessons in the real world school.
We went out again with more stringent manufacturing requirements to bring out the best possible electric shaver with our designs. We interviewed several potential manufacturers with our stringent manufacturing criteria as well the manufacturer’s history of its treatment of employees. We realized that we will be able to accomplish that, but it will not be cheap.
Our limited experience shows that there is a real demand for our shavers. Your pledges will allow us to do a full run of both the Bald Eagle shaver series for men and the Butterfly shaver series for women.
 This shaver will transform the way men and women shave their heads, faces and bodies.

Home of the Horizontal Shaver ™




We've listened to all the reviews, issues and concerns to make the necessary changes and upgrades. We have incorporated all the improvements in the following brand new three models:
Actual models may slightly vary from the prototype pictures.

Bald Eagle Pro (prototype)

Butterfly Shavers™ for Women.  Pink picture. Pro and Smart Series
 


Butterfly Pro (prototype)
 
Butterfly Shavers™ II for Women have added grooves on the sides. See blue shaver picture.  
  Butterfly Pro II (prototype)
  Pro Series Features:






· 
Two hour quick charge for 60 minutes usage


· 
Corded (mains) or cordless operation


· 
5 LED light screen for battery level indicator


· 
Washable IPX 5, wet/dry shaving


· 
100-240V UL certified adaptor


· 
Battery life charge/recharge 500 times


· 
Motor: 10500 RPM


· 
Rubberized body for grip, chromed shaver head


· 
Powerful motor


· 
On/ Off smooth switch



Detachable shaver head (optional accessory attachments
will also be available)


Smart Series Features (All features of Pro plus the following)







LCD digital light battery level indicator


Compatible with our USB charger attachment (Optional)



Our MSRP for any Pro series model will be $150 and any Smart series model will be $180 

A Whole New “Bald Game”




New Normal in Electric Shaver™
